job_text: ['', 'Company', 'Must have a degree in a STEM or social science field, or equivalent real-world experience.Must have at least 6 months experience in a Data Science or Data Analyst position.A Masters or Doctorate Degree in a STEM or social science field is a plus but not necessary.Experience with machine learning (Scikit Learn, Tensor Flow, H20), data mining, regressions, generalized linear models, experimental design, and/or GIS.Educational background or experience in linear algebra, Bayesian statistics, or calculus. Must be able to learn quickly and juggle multiple projects with moving deadlines.Must have strong analytical skills.Must be competent in Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.Must have at least 1 year of professional experience with R, Python, or similar data analytical tools.Experience with commercial operations or similar efforts is a plus.Experience with computer programming is a plus.', 'Must be able to learn quickly and juggle multiple projects with moving deadlines.', 'Qualifications', 'Job Description', 'Must have a degree in a STEM or social science field, or equivalent real-world experience.', 'Compensation', 'Experience with machine learning (Scikit Learn, Tensor Flow, H20), data mining, regressions, generalized linear models, experimental design, and/or GIS.', 'A Masters or Doctorate Degree in a STEM or social science field is a plus but not necessary.', 'Must have at least 6 months experience in a Data Science or Data Analyst position.', 'Experience with computer programming is a plus.', 'Must have at least 1 year of professional experience with R, Python, or similar data analytical tools.', 'Must have strong analytical skills.', 'Experience with commercial operations or similar efforts is a plus.', 'Must be competent in Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.', 'Educational background or experience in linear algebra, Bayesian statistics, or calculus. ']

['', 'The candidate will primarily work on the development of our operational weather and climate prediction product. This involves wrangling and combining several data streams from different sources such as web APIs, 2D and 3D climate datasets, satellite data, etc. Further, there will be an active research component looking at how to constantly improve our product through advanced machine learning techniques.', 'Familiarity with environmental or geographical data', 'Most importantly, candidate must have a passion for working on tackling issues at the cutting edge of climate change adaptation and resilience.', 'Familiarity with basic concepts of statistics/machine learning', 'The candidate will be supervised by our senior data scientist and work in close collaboration with the software engineering team. Familiarity with a range of techniques and tools to process data in Python is a requirement. Experience with packaging and modularizing Python code is a plus. ', 'Experience writing packaged Python code ', 'BS/MS in computer science, applied math, physics or environmental scienceExperience handling data in Python: Pandas, xarray, numpy, etc.Familiarity with environmental or geographical dataFamiliarity with basic concepts of statistics/machine learningExperience writing packaged Python code Experience with Git and working on the cloudMost importantly, candidate must have a passion for working on tackling issues at the cutting edge of climate change adaptation and resilience.', 'About ClimateAi ', 'The candidate will primarily work on the development of our operational weather and climate prediction product. This involves wrangling and combining several data streams from different sources such as web APIs, 2D and 3D climate datasets, satellite data, etc. Further, there will be an active research component looking at how to constantly improve our product through advanced machine learning techniques.The candidate will be supervised by our senior data scientist and work in close collaboration with the software engineering team. Familiarity with a range of techniques and tools to process data in Python is a requirement. Experience with packaging and modularizing Python code is a plus. The ideal candidate will be comfortable working with a close team in a fast-paced environment. Communicating between climate scientists and software engineers will be crucial. Expect to give and receive constructive criticism as we foster a highly dynamic, fast-paced, collaborative work environment focused on rapid learning and adaptation. While we are interested in all qualified applicants, the position is well suited for someone with a BS/MS in a relevant field and demonstrated strong coding skills.Work will be remote. Any location within a US/European time zone is possible.The expected date of joining will be 1 February 2021 at the latest.', 'Work will be remote. Any location within a US/European time zone is possible.', 'Experience handling data in Python: Pandas, xarray, numpy, etc.', 'The ideal candidate will be comfortable working with a close team in a fast-paced environment. Communicating between climate scientists and software engineers will be crucial. Expect to give and receive constructive criticism as we foster a highly dynamic, fast-paced, collaborative work environment focused on rapid learning and adaptation. While we are interested in all qualified applicants, the position is well suited for someone with a BS/MS in a relevant field and demonstrated strong coding skills.', 'Experience with Git and working on the cloud', 'BS/MS in computer science, applied math, physics or environmental science', 'The expected date of joining will be 1 February 2021 at the latest.']

statistics, uplift modeling, marketing mix models, econometric modeling, predictive modeling, machine learning, etc.)', '-Strong written and verbal communication skills', "-Minimum of 2+ years' experience using data mining tools and advanced analytical methods in a business environment or advanced technical degree", '-Experience with data visualization', '-Knowledge and proficiency in R', '-Consults on internal database(s) in collaboration with business partners (e.g., IT, Marketing) to ensure data quality', 'OTHER KEY QUALIFICATIONS:', '-Strong desire to learn new data mining languages and techniques', '-Uses the correct data mining approach to solve business problems including customer segmentation, marketing and promotional campaigns, operations enablers, and various market-growth initiatives', '-Strong analytical and problem solving skills with a solid understanding of business', '-Ability to work independently and with team']

', '• We are undergoing modernization of our data science practices from SAS legacy systems to the latest tools in Amazon Web Services (AWS) where we leverage data hosting and machine learning services. This role requires candidates who embrace change and are willing to continuously learn as data science industry tools and practices change', 'WHY WORK AT GENWORTH', '• Develop and perform preliminary exploratory analysis on datasets associated with building advanced ML models. Ability to work with structured and unstructured data', 'The duties and responsibilities of this role require that the position be physically based in the USMI headquarters office in Raleigh, NC.', '• Bachelor’s degree required', '• Become a trusted analytical partner to the functional areas of support (Marketing, customer solutions, Underwriting, Loss Mitigation, Pricing) and collaborate on the development and planning of analytic projects in response to business needs', '• We give back to the communities where we live ', '• Ability to translate business needs into technical requirements', '• Experience or background in customer focused fields including mortgage business, marketing, sales, customer research and product management', '• 3+ years of experience in one or more of the following statistical / analytic languages such as Python, Apache Spark (or PySpark), Hive, Scala, preferably in a cloud computing environment e.g. AWS, Databricks, Azure, Cloudera, Hortonworks, Google Cloud, Anaconda etc.', '• Partner with IT and Enterprise Data Management Organization (EDMO) teams on the evaluation of data assets and their proper use', 'We know we can’t deliver on our mission unless we deliver for our employees. That’s why we’re committed to creating a work environment that fosters diversity, inclusion, excellence, improvement and connection. We know each employee contributes in their own unique way and we’re dedicated to supporting every one of them to help them reach their full potential.', 'o Tuition Reimbursement and Student Loan Repayment', '• Demonstrate strong business acumen and understanding of mortgage insurance concepts', 'Genworth Financial, Inc. is a leading insurance holding company committed to helping families achieve the dream of home ownership and address the financial challenges of aging through its leadership positions in mortgage insurance and long-term care insurance. Headquartered in Richmond, Virginia, Genworth traces its roots back to 1871. ', '• Experience in advance analytics. Hands-on experience with logistic regression, time series, forecasting, optimization, and other predictive modeling techniques. ML experience and knowledge of ML platforms, libraries and programming', 'Raleigh, NC', 'The Data Scientist is part of a highly analytical team that provides business critical intelligence and advice for decision support. In this role, you will collaborate with partners in operations (underwriting, claims), marketing, products and customer experience, pricing, risk and other functions to define problems, identify data, build reports and dashboards, establish predictive and prescriptive models, and deliver optimal solutions across the entire range of Genworth’s line of business and customers. ', '• We work on challenging and rewarding projects', 'QUALIFICATIONS', 'YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES', '• We offer competitive benefits including:', '• Ability to influence decision makers and drive consensus', 'o 40 hours of volunteer time off', '• Ensure accuracy of results and analytic methods. Perform regular validation and collaborations of the analytical models', 'o Paid Family Leave', '• Fulfill ad-hoc requests timely and efficiently', '• Determine requirements, evaluate analytical approaches and take ownership of the processes of creating predictive models to optimize decision making for functional areas', '• Strong communication (i.e. oral, written, interpersonal, and presentation) skills', '• Ability to perform complex day-to-day ETL tasks such as data gathering, data cleaning, wrangling, coding or programming, business and analytics requirements gathering, and data analysis ', 'o 20 days of Choice Time Off your first full year', '• Provide mentorship and share knowledge with functional and cross-functional peers', 'Genworth Mortgage Insurance, headquartered in Raleigh, North Carolina, is a global mortgage insurer with a major presence in the United States and Australia. With origins dating back to 1980, Genworth Mortgage Insurance provides primary mortgage guaranty insurance coverage on residential mortgage loans, as well as mortgage pool insurance policies that enhance insurance coverage for various types of mortgage-related securities. Our mortgage insurance can help individuals secure low down payment loans and realize the dream of home ownership faster – even for the first time.', 'o Medical, Dental, Vision, Flexible Spending Account options beginning your first day ']

This position may be subject to a background check. Any convictions will be evaluated to determine if they directly relate to the responsibilities and requirements of the position. Having a conviction history will not automatically disqualify an applicant from being considered for employment.  Diversity, equity, and inclusion are core values at Berkeley Lab. Successful candidates for our faculty positions will demonstrate evidence of a commitment to advancing equity and inclusion.  Work will be primarily performed at Lawrence Berkeley National Lab, 1 Cyclotron Road, Berkeley, CA. company: Oak Ridge Institute for Science and Education
job_text: ['', 'Preferred skills:', 'The qualified candidate should have received a\xa0doctoral degree in one of the relevant fields.', 'Interest in learning about research in Big Data and how large science programs function', 'Learning Objectives:\xa0', 'Participant Stipend:\xa0The participant(s) will receive a monthly stipend commensurate with educational level and experience.', 'Practical knowledge of agricultural sciences, biology or a similar field as well as practical knowledge of computer science', 'Under the mentorship of a Chief Science Information Officer (CSIO) and with guidance from members of the Scientific Advisory Committee, participant activities will include: (1) coordinate the development, planning, and assessment of scientific computing, AI, and data science workshops and trainings, (2) coordinate activities and synthesize results by BDI fellows, (3) learn how to produce a scientific newsletter for the BDI, and how to create and update material on a website, and (4) develop, create, and evaluate surveys of training needs.', '*Applications may be reviewed on a rolling-basis and this posting could close before the deadline.', 'Questions:\xa0Please visit our\xa0Program Website at https://orise.orau.gov/usda-ars/index.html. After reading, if you have additional questions about the application process, please email\xa0USDA-ARS@orau.org\xa0and include the reference code for this opportunity.', 'ARS\xa0Office/Lab and Location:\xa0Multiple postdoctoral research opportunities are available with\xa0the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA), Agricultural Research Service (ARS), Jornada Research Unit in Las Cruces, New Mexico.', 'Skill in scientific and technical writing, the development of presentations, and the fundamentals of web page design and content development', 'Questions', 'Qualifications', 'Knowledge of qualitative and quantitative analytical techniques such as surveys, questionnaires, or interviews and statistics', 'Appointment Length:\xa0', 'Participant Stipend', 'Research Project:\xa0', 'Anticipated Appointment Start Date:\xa0', 'Citizenship Requirements', 'ORISE Information', 'ARS\xa0Office/Lab and Location:\xa0', 'ARS\xa0Office/Lab and Location', 'Learning Objectives', 'Research Project:\xa0The U.S. Department of Agriculture - Agricultural Research Service (USDA ARS) mission involves problem-solving research in the widely diverse food and agricultural areas encompassing plant production and protection; animal production and protection; natural resources and sustainable agricultural systems; and nutrition; food safety; and quality. The programs are conducted in 46 of the 50 States, Puerto Rico, and the U.S. Virgin Islands. For ARS to maintain its standing as a premier scientific organization, major investments in computing, networking, and storage infrastructure are required. Training in data and information management are integral to the integrity, security, and accessibility of research findings, results, and outcomes within the ARS research enterprise. Nearly 2000 scientists and support staff conduct research within the ARS research enterprise.', 'Skill in the facilitation of meetings and in working with people', 'Citizenship Requirements:\xa0', 'Level of Participation', 'Level of Participation:\xa0The appointment is full-time.', 'Appointment Length', 'Anticipated Appointment Start Date:\xa0Start date is flexible and will\xa0depend on a variety of\xa0factors.', 'ORISE Information:\xa0', 'Participant Stipend:\xa0', 'USDA-ARS Contact:', 'Throughout the course of this research project, the participant will have the opportunity to gain experience in and learn about\xa0the challenges associated with managing, coordinating, and training a diverse scientific workforce to access and successfully use high performance computing resources for scientific research. The\xa0participant will learn about the ARS Big Data Initiative (BDI;\xa0scinet.usda.gov) that is responsible for three major components: (1) a high-capacity network as the backbone of a research data and information conduit among ARS locations (SciNet); (2) high-performance computing and storage infrastructure available to all ARS scientific staff; and (3) a virtual research support core (VRSC), a group of personnel with diverse skills in scientific computing that provides support and training to ARS scientists and staff.', 'Level of Participation:\xa0', 'Skill in verbal communication', 'Research Project', 'Learning Objectives:\xa0The\xa0participant will learn about a wide range of activities related to organizational and operational planning, training coordination, and science communication activities in support of the BDI and the ARS Ai Center of Excellence (AI COE). The\xa0participant will also have the opportunity to take on-line courses in scientific topics, such as R, Python and statistics, and to learn collaboration and leadership skills through workshop and working group experience.', 'Citizenship Requirements:\xa0This opportunity is available to U.S. citizens,\xa0Lawful Permanent Residents (LPR), and foreign nationals.\xa0Non-U.S. citizen applicants should refer to the\xa0Guidelines for Non-U.S. Citizens Details page (https://orise.orau.gov/usda-ars/current-participants/guidelines-non-us.html)\xa0of the program website for information about the valid immigration statuses that are acceptable for program participation.', 'Practical knowledge of agricultural sciences, biology or a similar field as well as practical knowledge of computer scienceSkill in the facilitation of meetings and in working with peopleKnowledge of qualitative and quantitative analytical techniques such as surveys, questionnaires, or interviews and statisticsSkill in verbal communicationSkill in scientific and technical writing, the development of presentations, and the fundamentals of web page design and content developmentInterest in learning about research in Big Data and how large science programs function', 'Questions:', 'The SCINet/Big Data Research Participation Program of the USDA ARS offers research opportunities to motivated postdoctoral fellows interested in working on agricultural- and natural resource-related problems at a range of spatial and temporal scales, from the genome to the continent, and sub-daily to evolutionary time scales. One of the goals of the SCINet Initiative is to develop and apply new technologies, including AI and machine learning, to help solve complex agricultural problems that also depend on collaboration across scientific disciplines and geographic locations. In addition, many of these technologies rely on the synthesis, integration, and analysis of large, diverse datasets that benefit from high performance computers (HPC). The objective of\xa0this fellowship\xa0is to facilitate cross-disciplinary, cross-location research through collaborative research on problems of interest to each applicant and amenable to or required by the HPC environment. Training will be provided in specific AI, machine learning, deep learning, and statistical software needed for the HPC.', 'USDA-ARS Contact:\xa0If you have questions about the nature of the research, please contact\xa0Debra Peters (deb.peters@usda.gov).', 'Anticipated Appointment Start Date', 'Appointment Length:\xa0The appointment will initially be for\xa0one year, but may be\xa0renewed upon\xa0recommendation of ARS\xa0and is contingent on the availability of funds.', 'ORISE Information:\xa0This program, administered by ORAU through its contract with the U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) to manage the Oak Ridge Institute for Science and Education (ORISE), was established through an interagency agreement between DOE and ARS.\xa0Participants do not become employees of USDA, ARS, DOE or the program administrator, and there are no employment-related benefits.\xa0Proof of health insurance is required for participation in this program. Health insurance can be obtained through ORISE.']

['', 'Experience in the commercial pharmaceuticals business.', 'Experience with sales and marketing best practices, processes, and related technology.', 'This position can be based in one of our following locations: Titusville, NJ, Raritan, NJ, Spring House, PA, or Horsham, PA.', 'Strong working knowledge of AI-type algorithms, including machine learning techniques such as regression, decision trees, probability networks, association rules, clustering, neural networks, and/or Bayesian models.', 'Strong communication skills.', 'Proficient with one or more programming language such as Python, R, SAS or Java.', 'Proficiency with SQL is a plus. ['', '• Conceptualize, develop and maintain dashboards for risk detection and monitoring.', '• Experience of working in Trust and Safety at a tech company.', 'As a Data Scientist on our Trust & Safety team you are instrumental in ensuring we use data analysis to keep our users and community safe. You will help scope out projects, ideate on new strategies, and most importantly, use data to find insights, diagnose problems and tell compelling stories. You will work closely with product manager, engineers, operations teams, and policy specialists on measuring risks, and detecting and preventing negative experiences on our product.', '• Develop metrics to evaluate risks of the platform and the effectiveness of safety programs.', '• 2+ years of experience in data science or quantitative analysis.', '• Use data to identify trends, conduct root cause analysis and suggest potential opportunities for process improvements.', 'Building a world where people can safely discover, create and connect.', 'What will I be doing?', 'The Trust & Safety team at TikTok helps ensure that our global community is safe and empowered to create and enjoy content across all of our applications.', '• Experience in deep learning, distributed computing (Hive/Hadoop), or social network analysis.', "TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.", 'TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy.', 'Even better if:', '• Devise data-driven strategies to proactively identify, detect, and mitigate risk to our users and community. ', '• Experience with SQL, ETL, R/Python.', '• Influence stakeholders through data-based recommendations and mobilize cross-functional teams by telling compelling stories with data.', 'What should I bring with me?', '• Degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g., Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, Mathematics) or equivalent practical experience.', '• Strong communication skills across technical and non-technical audiences and the ability to synthesize and communicate complex concepts and analyses in easy to understand ways.', '• Experience with data modeling and statistical analysis techniques, including: hypothesis testing, model evaluation, and common regression and classification algorithms.']

['', 'Over the past 5 years, we have developed and deployed analyses ranging from price simulations on single projects to full-scale decision support systems that help our people work safer, bid smarter and help ensure financial performance. From a technical perspective, you would have excellent access to databases company-wide and apply modern machine learning methodologies – primarily from the Python language. ['', 'Optimize code to run efficiently in a distributed data environment', 'Knowledge and a basic understanding of the fundamental processes of pharmaceutical and medical device industriesAn avid interest in healthcare analytics, technology, and clinical dataStrong attention to detailStrong capabilities in multi-tasking and flexibility for a dynamic working environmentBusiness acumen and a fundamental understanding of the sales processStrong interpersonal and communication skillsAbility to think creativelyPrior working experience in any of the following forecasting, statistics, predictive modeling, primary/secondary market research, technology & applications, healthcare IT, managed markets, management consulting, sales force effectiveness, sales operations, business intelligence, epidemiology, HEOR, or data miningAdvanced experience coding SQL or Scala in a distributed database environment required', 'Analyze secondary data and research to identify key findings and trends', 'Generous Salary & Performance-based commission commensurate with experience', 'Assist in drafting and updating internal tools with supportive documentation for projects and process flows for evolving standard operations and procedures', 'RomAnalytics is recruiting this exciting REMOTE position on behalf of an AI-driven pharmaceutical omni-channel marketing solution company. The company combines real-world claims data with advanced AI. The company is uniquely positioned to find, engage, and convert a pharmaceutical brand’s Ideal Patient Population and their associated healthcare providers, offering a unique omni-channel solution to life sciences organizations.', 'Skills & Experience', 'Strong capabilities in multi-tasking and flexibility for a dynamic working environment', 'Strong attention to detail', 'Independently research and procure core knowledge of diagnoses and treatment in specific therapeutic areas to drive internal business decisions for the design of user-defined functions', 'Strong interpersonal and communication skills', 'Ability to think creatively', 'Assist in the management of projects and workstreams and help with shifting priorities', 'Prior working experience in any of the following forecasting, statistics, predictive modeling, primary/secondary market research, technology & applications, healthcare IT, managed markets, management consulting, sales force effectiveness, sales operations, business intelligence, epidemiology, HEOR, or data mining', 'Support creation of architecture and manipulation of health data assets into a distributed data environment and develop utilities to support data extraction and analysis', 'Develop broad knowledge of the healthcare market and monitor market changes and events within the industry', 'Live and breath AI??? Join a team that is living and breathing AI into the Life Science Industry!\xa0', '\xa0', 'Generate cohesive outputs in summary outputs (R, Scala, Python) tying project objectives and goals to data output', 'Knowledge and a basic understanding of the fundamental processes of pharmaceutical and medical device industries', 'The Position:', 'Optimize code to run efficiently in a distributed data environmentSupport creation of architecture and manipulation of health data assets into a distributed data environment and develop utilities to support data extraction and analysisIndependently research and procure core knowledge of diagnoses and treatment in specific therapeutic areas to drive internal business decisions for the design of user-defined functionsAnalyze secondary data and research to identify key findings and trendsGenerate cohesive outputs in summary outputs (R, Scala, Python) tying project objectives and goals to data outputAssist in drafting quantitative or qualitative analysis to support client deliverables and issuesAssist in the management of projects and workstreams and help with shifting prioritiesAssist in drafting and updating internal tools with supportive documentation for projects and process flows for evolving standard operations and proceduresDevelop broad knowledge of the healthcare market and monitor market changes and events within the industry', 'Assist in drafting quantitative or qualitative analysis to support client deliverables and issues', 'Compensation Package:', 'Business acumen and a fundamental understanding of the sales process', 'Advanced experience coding SQL or Scala in a distributed database environment required', 'An avid interest in healthcare analytics, technology, and clinical data']

['', '· Fluency in Python and ML/NLP libraries.', '· Strong verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to interact effectively with colleagues of varying technical and non-technical abilities.', '· Serve as a subject matter expert for natural language processing (NLP) and natural language\xa0understanding (NLU), and partner with functional experts across the company to bring that expertise to bear on some of the hardest and most exciting problems in this space.', '· Deep technical skills in machine learning, deep learning and natural language processing with the ability to explain and present deep technical ideas.', '· Serve as key technical resource for more junior machine learning engineers, helping them solve the most difficult problems.', '· Develop and enhance the predictive capability of in-house developed supply chain risk models for use by some of the biggest enterprises in the world.', 'Qualifications:', '· Provide technical guidance to product teams on the choice of machine learning approaches appropriate for a task.', 'They have\xa0raised $26M in total funding. They\xa0have 70+ employees and are poised to double in size by end of 2020.\xa0', '· Work with MLOps to deliver production systems with your models.', '· 5+ years of hands-on experience in machine learning, predictive modeling, and analysis.', 'The selected applicants will have the opportunity to experiment with large data sets, cutting edge language models, and be supported by a crack team of software engineers and data analysts ready to create the best training data possible and help operationalize your models on AWS infrastructure. This job is an individual contributor position, but you will have significant input into research and product development decisions and serve as a key technical leader within the company.', 'This is a 100% remote role with a series B start up seeking 3-4 Senior MLE to join their growing team. ', '· Experience with time-series forecasting.', 'You will contribute to industry-leading-edge projects using your data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence skills to transfer ideas into solutions for some of the most challenging technical problems that will delight customers. You will be a key driver in taking something from an idea to an experiment to a prototype and finally to a live production system.', '· Analyze and extract relevant information from large amounts of data and derive useful insights.', '· Use machine learning, data mining, statistical techniques, and others to create actionable, meaningful, and scalable solutions for business problems.', '· A passion for creating innovative techniques and making these methods robust and scalable.', '· Experience with databases and data structuring/warehousing.', '5+ years of machine learning in a production environment-no less than 5 years of experience will suffice. ', 'Our client is one of the most transformative technologically advanced platforms that powers the global economy supply chain. By using ML and big data, they aspire to dynamically and continuously map all of a company’s business relationships to multiple tiers of dependency on a global scale and endeavors to help customers understand risk in their multi-tier, global supply chains. The scope of this value proposition extends across a variety of different technology sectors including risk management, supply chain intelligence, financial intelligence and cyber-security.', '· Track record of productionizing ML models.', 'STRONG Python skills', 'THE OPPORTUNITY', "Our client is a product-oriented company. They are building the world's first fully connected knowledge graph of commercial entities to understand global supply chain risk for our customers. The data to do this does not exist, so they are making it. They are looking for world-class machine learning engineers, experts on extracting structured information from unstructured text. They want to identify real-time risk across every company in our customers ecosystems and beyond.", 'KEY RESPONSIBILITIES', 'QUALIFICATIONS', '· Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data analyses, model development, model validation, and model implementation.', '· Creative, collaborative, & innovation focused.', '· Experience with transformer and recurrent language models BERT, GPT2, LSTM, Word2Vec', "You want to solve problems for which you can't just Google answers. You want to deal with real big data in actual products that real people use. You want exposure to cutting edge tech, including machine learning at scale, graph databases, and predictive modeling. And you want it all in a high-growth startup.", 'They need an extraordinary team member who thrives as part of a fast-paced team and takes pride in their ability to succeed while delivering value to our customers. Be challenged by innovation and grow professionally by solving one of the most interesting challenges impacting businesses across the globe.', '· MS or PhD in Machine Learning, Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or Applied Mathematics.']

['', 'Productive, efficient, and able to work independently with minimal supervision', 'Ph.D. degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Math required2-3 years of experience working for a technology company preferred but recent PHD graduates are also encouraged to applyStrong evidence of performing novel work, illustrated with academic publications or patentsStrong foundation in software development such as Python, C++, C, Pytorch, TensorflowAbility to explain and present deep technical ideasProductive, efficient, and able to work independently with minimal supervision\xa0', 'Ability to explain and present deep technical ideas', '*Opportunity to work remotely until offices reopen ', 'Competitive compensation based on experience and academic record)', 'Open to sponsorship (F-1 Visa, H1B Visa, or Green Card)', 'Learn and work alongside some of the smartest professionals in the industry\xa0', 'Strong foundation in software development such as Python, C++, C, Pytorch, Tensorflow', 'Join a global company that’s always one step ahead of consumer electronics and digital information technology. Their growing research and development arm is seeking a machine learning expert who will bolster its reputation for innovative technology, software development, and consumer-centric design.', 'Strong evidence of performing novel work, illustrated with academic publications or patents', 'Apply now!', 'Be at the forefront of state-of-the-art technology.', 'We’re looking for researchers with a passion for machine learning - those who seek a balance between business and academia. You enjoy a challenge and see the opportunity it presents to write the future. You’re creative, collaborative, an independent thinker, and have an innate curiosity for emerging technologies.\xa0', 'Theory meets practical application.', '\xa0', 'Competitive compensation based on experience and academic record)*Opportunity to work remotely until offices reopen Excellent work-life balance, office culture, and benefitsLearn and work alongside some of the smartest professionals in the industry\xa0Open to sponsorship (F-1 Visa, H1B Visa, or Green Card)', '2-3 years of experience working for a technology company preferred but recent PHD graduates are also encouraged to apply', 'In this role, you’ll have the best of both worlds: you’ll join a small, agile team while being backed by a fast-growing global company that is strongly affiliated with reputable technology universities and research institutions.', 'As a Machine Learning Researcher, you’ll collaborate with teams to research, conceive and develop prototypes to create state-of-the-art systems in the following areas: Artificial Intelligence, compression, machine learning, signal processing, video and image processing. You will write software using Python, C++, and C, design and implement new machine learning algorithms and techniques across a variety of applications. You’ll also have exposure and direct involvement in our future-focused innovations, such as virtual reality and a machine-guided approach to signal decompositions and coding.', 'Ph.D. degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Math required', 'The position starts remote but will relocate to Portland, OR.', 'Excellent work-life balance, office culture, and benefits', 'In this role, you’ll actively engage with academic networks by publishing your work and participating in research and industry initiatives. You will also have the opportunity to expand your skillsets in data science, machine learning and artificial intelligence to revolutionize modern signal processing applications and technologies.', 'Build new, intelligent applications that millions of people will benefit from.']

advanced degrees preferredStrong programming skills, experience with programming languages (SQL, R, Python)3-8 years of experience in equity risk modeling and quantitative modelsStrong written and verbal communications with the ability to communicate with Portfolio Managers and TradersAbility to work independently and in ambiguous environments', '3-8 years of experience in equity risk modeling and quantitative models', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Strong programming skills, experience with programming languages (SQL, R, Python)', 'Assisting in building various parts of quantitative framework', 'Degree in a technical or quantitative field; advanced degrees preferred', 'Strong written and verbal communications with the ability to communicate with Portfolio Managers and Traders', 'Collaborate with the Risk, Portfolio, and Business Managers to ensure accurate application of the quantitative framework in day-to-day workflows', 'Job Description: Portfolio Researcher', 'Work with Tech department to put into production quantitative models', 'Qualifications/Skills Required', 'Principal Responsibilities', 'Millennium’s Global Risk Management Department is responsible for identifying, measuring, monitoring, managing, and reporting on the risks associated with Millennium portfolios. Our Risk Management organization is designed to accommodate the overall size, nature, and complexity of the firm’s trading activities.', 'Founded in 1989, Millennium is one of the largest and longest operating hedge funds in the industry with over $39 billion in assets under management. We allocate capital across more than 200 entrepreneurial portfolio managers that invest in a diverse set of strategies. Our goal is to help our global investors meet their investment objectives by achieving absolute returns with minimal risk over the long-term. We do this by empowering our portfolio managers through proprietary technology and resources at scale, to create a uniquely diversified investment platform.', 'With more than 3,000 employees, our firm harnesses the entrepreneurial drive of our people. We seek to attract, develop and retain the best talent in the industry. We offer an opportunity to develop your career by working with a leadership team that has years of industry experience across a variety of disciplines. We encourage our team to work together in a collegial and collaborative team-based environment. We empower them to act like owners by making decisions based on a combination of rigorous analysis and an open, creative mentality. This enables us to continuously improve our day-to-day activities, and ultimately the firm as a whole.', 'A Career at Millennium ', 'Research and implement various research models including factor models, and risk assessments', "We are looking to add an inquisitive minded Portfolio Researcher to our team. You will have the opportunity to develop and maintain the quantitative frameworks used by our portfolio managers and senior management teams. You will be responsible for the framework which involves factor modelling, tail risk and liquidity risk measurements, portfolio analysis, and developing optimization toolkits. If you're passionate about quantitative finance, portfolio management, and applied statistics, we'd love to hear from you."]

['', 'Additional:', 'Education and Experience:', 'We are looking for talented people with excellent engineering skills and deep knowledge of Machine Learning who can analyze problems, develop innovative solutions, and implement fully automated systems.', '\xa0', '+ Heavy R programming experience is a plus.', 'The individual will engage in high profile data science and artificial intelligence projects working closely with a team of energy trader to define and implement next generation AI-based solutions. Candidate must be comfortable in a fast-paced, unpredictable and sometimes ambiguous environment working with current and emerging AI technologies. This is a multi-disciplinary role requiring both expert model-building and software engineering skills, so the successful candidate will be capable of developing and supporting core, reusable AI capabilities across many areas, and must have a proven record of providing thought leadership on end-to-end AI/machine learning pipelines and related components for other data science associates. ', 'PhD or MS in Computer Science; Physics; Engineering; Information Technology; Applied Mathematics, or related fields with, preferably, 5-7 years of experience prototyping and deploying Machine/Deep Learning solutions into production environments. Hands-on experience with one or more of the following: Deep learning/neural network architectures, reinforcement learning, generative modeling, conversational AI, virtual assistants, automated speech recognition, unstructured text pipelines/modeling, anomaly detection, text summarization, classification, especially with NL/NLU/NLGP-related language models and encoders, e.g., Word2Vec, Glove, Bi-LSTMs, Attention Models, BERT, ALBERT, DeepCT, etc. Expertise with deep learning frameworks/tools such as TensorFlow, PyTorch/PyCharm, Keras, MXNET, and/or H2OFluent in data science programming languages such as Python, R and at least one other programming language, e.g., C/C++, Scala, Julia, Java, Go, especially on GPU.CUDA experience a plus. Engineering expertise for building production ML/DL model containers and pipelines at scale, specifically with Kubernetes, Docker, and big data technologies.']

['', 'Highly competitive compensation package including salary and equity as well as the opportunity to work for one of the fastest growing marketing technology companies', 'Monthly fitness stipend for a gym membership or fitness classes', 'Evangelizing Bluecore Data Science internally and externally', 'Meeting with customers to discuss our machine learning models and roadmap', 'Our models operate at scale and crunch through millions of data points to make decisions that have been shown to double revenue and triple reach, and are designed in a flexible manner to generalize across our set of 400+ diverse customers who span industries from apparel to automotive.\xa0To explore, build, deploy, and maintain models we leverage many tools such as BigQuery, Spark, Cloud SQL, Keras, TensorFlow, Airflow, Kubernetes, and Google Compute Engine. as well as the opportunity to work for one of the fastest growing marketing technology companiesComprehensive medical, dental, and vision insurance401(k) planMonthly fitness stipend for a gym membership or fitness classesMonthly public transportationGenerous Parental Leave & flexible vacation policy', 'Responsibilities:', '\xa0', 'Benefits:', "Over the past six years Bluecore has shown that Marketing Teams can create meaningful and valuable experiences for their customers using only first party data; an increasingly important proposition with the rise in concerns around online privacy and third party data. As a Principal Data Scientist, you'll be joining a dedicated group of Data Scientists and Engineers at the forefront of exploring exciting ways to activate that data asset. We build powerful models that enable Marketers to make the right decisions and engage their customers with personalized content that is timely, relevant, and valuable.\xa0Our approach to building models is an academic one, starting with a literature search, a baseline, and an iterative process of training and validation to identify the most suitable model that is as simple as possible and as powerful as necessary.\xa0We employ a wide variety of models, such as Bayesian models for predicting customer lifetime value, matrix factorization to identify a customer’s product affinity, and reinforcement learning models to optimize content, timing, and frequency of marketing communications.", 'Experience setting ML/AI project roadmaps', 'Being a technical mentor for senior and junior team members', 'Experience with ML at scale', 'Identifying appropriate models/algorithms to solve product requirements', 'Comprehensive medical, dental, and vision insurance', 'Experience with Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Natural Language Processing, Time Series Analysis, and/or Optimization', 'Writing internal and external facing documentation describing models and approaches, such as wiki pages, white papers, blog posts or journal papers', 'Bluecore is a retail marketing technology company that is reimagining the way retailers communicate with shoppers. The 2019 launch of Bluecore Communicate™ introduces retailers to a fundamentally different email solution that replaces manual processes with an intelligent, AI-driven workflow. More than 400 retail brands, including Staples, Tommy Hilfiger, The North Face, TomboyX, and Bass Pro Shops, increase their marketing performance with less effort through Bluecore. Bluecore has been recognized as one of the Best Places to Work by Glassdoor and is ranked No. 241 on the Inc. 500 List, the most prestigious ranking of the nation’s fastest-growing private companies.', 'Proposing and drive technical initiatives', 'We are looking for Principal Data Scientists with a strong mathematical background to work alongside our Engineering Teams to build the next generation of retail and commerce models that delight and empower marketers.\xa0The ideal candidate is one that has several years of experience researching, building, serving, and maintaining data science models at scale. They are able to work with our Product Team to translate product requirements into the correct objectives, perform literature searches to identify the right approach, design thoughtful experiments, and write production code to serve the model and maintain it.\xa0They have first-hand experience with what works and what doesn’t, and are eager to share this experience with both junior and senior members and guide them through that process.\xa0They are also able to, and excited to, help architect the data science infrastructure needed to accelerate innovation on models and facilitate serving and maintaining them. Finally, they should be curious and eager to identify and explore the myriad of other products that can be built on our unique data asset.\xa0Our culture emphasizes making good tradeoffs, working as a team, and leaving your ego at the door.', '401(k) plan']

['', 'Create value in collected data by developing commercial and operational KPIs', 'Fluence, a Siemens and AES company, is the leading global energy storage technology solutions and services company that combines the agility of a fast-growing technology company with the expertise, vision, and financial backing of two industry powerhouses. The company offers proven energy storage technology solutions designed to address the diverse needs and challenges of customers in a rapidly transforming energy landscape, providing design, delivery and integration in over 160 countries. Fluence works closely with customers throughout their journey and provides advisory, financing, and project lifecycle services. You are good at finding ways to best impart your knowledge to internal teams and our customers.']

job_title: Data Scientist - Must be US Citizen and 5 years of experience - remote
job_text: ['', 'Experience for Robotic Process Automation', 'Document data requirements to support analytics needs', '5 years’ experience as a Data Scientist', 'Applicants responding to this position must be a US Citizen and will be subject to a government security investigation and must meet eligibility requirements by currently possessing the ability to view classified government information.', 'Qualifications:', 'At Lifescale Analytics, we help achieve data-driven decisions by leveraging strategic technologies to create innovative solutions that ultimately help our clients to navigate their ever-changing data landscape. We have a remote opportunity for a\xa0Data Scientist.\xa0The qualified candidate must have 5 years of experience identifying and documenting sources of component data and experience working with Machine Learning. The candidate will be responsible for analyzing data, developing algorithms, and working with developers and users to enhance operational systems. This is a remote role, and the person hired will be required to travel to Raleigh, NC occasionally if needed.', 'Who we are', 'Scope analytic processes, including creating and documenting associated infrastructure and workflow', 'Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science or equivalent in related work experience', 'Algorithm development and Machine Learning Delivery', 'Strong attention experienceModel development experience", 'Machine Learning Delivery experience', 'Scope analytic processes, including creating and documenting associated infrastructure and workflowPrescriptive organizational and interpersonal skills', 'Determine resources such as 1) profiling of source download data formats (RDMS SQL dump, ftp, XML/JSON, etc.), and 2) what data needed to complete analytics and to processed in data lake/data staging, etc...', 'Model development experience', 'Focused, driven individual', 'For more information, please visit our website at www.lifescaleanalytics.com', 'Determine data access methods (APIs, tool-kits, ETL and alike)', 'Lifescale Analytics, a woman-owned small business (WBENC and WOSB certifications) provides specialized expertise in data and analytics. Formed in 2012, the Lifescale Analytics team has years of experience providing a spectrum of customized data management services and solutions including Data Management/Analytics, Big Data Solutions, Cloud Services, Business Intelligence, and Data Science that focus on building strong portfolios and programs. Through experience and innovation, we allow businesses, pharmaceutical companies, financial institutions, and government agencies to manage and proactively make decisions based on their biggest asset, their data. Our specialists are skilled at managing, refining, analyzing, or visualizing information for the specific purpose of increasing the value of IT to benefit from the data science industry. This job will be remote until the client decides to have employees report to the site.', '3 years’ experience with Tableau or equivalent visualization tool', 'Recommend data architecture and schematics, ETL process/Tool, data governance, and potential integration with internal and external data, and analytic framework', 'Superior communications and presentation skills', 'Experience with Log Analytics, Splunk or Elasticsearch', 'Responsible for analyzing data, developing algorithms, and working with developers and users to enhance operational systems', 'Experience in analyzing, interpreting, and visualizing data']

projectAbility to deal with ambiguity in a fast-paced environment', 'Practical experience in Python, UNIX/Linux, SQL', 'Qualifications', 'BS with 3-5 years of experience in a data driven field, PhD w/5-8 a plus', 'ML in the cloud experience is a plus', 'Experience with data warehouse design and implementation', 'Metabolon, Inc., is the global leader in revealing biological insights on disease state and physiological reactions in the present time through metabolomics. Leveraging one of the world’s most diverse and rich patient data sets, Metabolon is equipped to deliver biologically relevant evidence to address some of the most difficult and pressing questions in the life sciences. Every day, our work is helping to accelerate research and product development success in the biopharma, population health, consumer products, agriculture, wellness and academic research sectors.', 'Provide assistance to the team with troubleshooting, researching the root cause, and thoroughly resolving defects in the event of a problem', 'Experience in a .NET environment is a plus', 'Drive architectural plans and implementation for future data storage, reporting, and analytic solutions', 'Experience with modern machine learning toolkits (Tensorflow, Keras, etc…)', 'Data Engineer', 'Develop across multiple codebases for in the service of scientific, business, internal and external concerns', 'Responsibilities:', 'Lead multiple simultaneous initiatives in an entrepreneurial environment', 'Direct experience with Microsoft Azure or Amazon EC2 and Redshift', 'Experience with NoSQL systems like MongoDB, Redis, or Cassandra', 'Experience with data visualization software (e.g., Tableau) or open-source project', 'Experience integrating scientific data, business data, reports and providing custom hooks for natural language processing, deep learning, and other modern mining approaches are all pluses', 'About Metabolon', 'Metabolon was founded in 2000 and is based in Research Triangle Park, North Carolina with an international headquarters in Germany. For more information, please visit www.metabolon.com.', "Modify, transform, clean, and normalize data so that it is usable by the team's data scientists and analysts", 'Design data schema and operate internal data warehouses and SQL/NoSQL database systems. Develop and integrate data pipelines in support and concert with machine learning needs (ex. ETL processes, triggers, stored procedures)', 'Monitor and troubleshoot operational or data issues in the data pipelines', "Design data schema and operate internal data warehouses and SQL/NoSQL database systems. ETL processes, triggers, stored procedures)Modify, transform, clean, and normalize data so that it is usable by the team's data scientists and analystsOwn the design, development, and maintenance of ongoing metrics, reports, analyses, and dashboards to drive key business decisionsMonitor and troubleshoot operational or data issues in the data pipelinesDrive architectural plans and implementation for future data storage, reporting, and analytic solutionsWork collaboratively with business analysts, data scientists, and other internal partners to identify opportunities/problemsProvide assistance to the team with troubleshooting, researching the root cause, and thoroughly resolving defects in the event of a problemDevelop across multiple codebases for in the service of scientific, business, internal and external concernsLead multiple simultaneous initiatives in an entrepreneurial environment", 'Experience designing and implementing genomic data pipelines', 'Metabolon is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, veteran status or any other protected status prohibited under Federal, State, or local laws. All employment decisions are based on valid job‐related requirements.', 'Experience with big data processing technology (e.g., Hadoop or ApacheSpark), data warehouse technical architecture, infrastructure components, ETL, and reporting/analytic tools and environments', 'Experience with dimensional data modeling and schema design in data warehouses', 'BS with 3-5 years of experience in a data driven field, PhD w/5-8 a plusExperience maintaining database/data cube architecture, configuration, management, and growthDemonstrated ability to design and implement ETL workflows across both Windows and Linux environmentsExperience with data warehouse design and implementationExperience with dimensional data modeling and schema design in data warehousesExperience interacting with machine learning approaches on a variety of large data setsBroad base of experience in data structures, modern platforms, evolving best practicesExperience integrating scientific data, business data, reports and providing custom hooks for natural language processing, deep learning, and other modern mining approaches are all pluses', 'Ability to deal with ambiguity in a fast-paced environment', 'Metabolon is the world leader in big data biochemistry. Our metabolomics platform is driving advances in precision medicine, biomarker discovery, diagnostic testing, and genome-based health initiatives. Data and machine learning are at the core of everything we do. We are seeking a Data Engineer to be an integral member of our data science team. Our data engineer will be responsible for the design, launch, integration, and scaling of data warehouse/data marts enabling Metabolon’s growing number of machine learning products. The successful candidate will have experience in designing and implementing a data warehouse to serve a variety of technical user bases. They will love the challenge of collecting, storing, usefully accessing, and wrangling data such that they and their data science team can collectively build useful products.']

job_title: Data Scientist up to $250,000 plus Equity [717]
job_text: ['', 'Candidates will need to have a PhD preferably in Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning. We are looking for people who have done work in one of the following areas:\xa0', 'Company Description:', 'Required Skills:', 'Candidates will need to have a PhD preferably in Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning.', 'One of our clients is looking to hire a "Data Scientist up to $250,000 plus Equity" in New York. Please find the job details below-', '• Generative Adversarial Networks', '• Causal Reasoning Ideal candidates would be able to rapidly iterate on new ideas with engineers, potentially publish at top conferences and be able to write code.', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. They have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We are backed by Eric Schmidt and Decibel Ventures with $18 million in Series A.', 'Responsible for coming up with new techniques in unsupervised learning, dataset augmentation and deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to automating various parts of the AI development workflow.', 'General Requirements:', 'Data Scientist up to $250,000 plus Equity" in New York', 'Unsupervised Learning\xa0', 'Generative Modeling\xa0', 'Job Description:', '• Deep Neural Networks', 'Deep Reinforcement Learning\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', '• Unsupervised Learning', 'Generative Adversarial Networks', '• Generative Modeling', 'Causal Reasoning Ideal candidates would be able to rapidly iterate on new ideas with engineers, potentially publish at top conferences and be able to write code.', 'Data Scientist\xa0', '• Deep Reinforcement Learning', 'Responsible for coming up with new techniques in unsupervised learning, dataset augmentation and deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to automating various parts of the AI development workflow.\xa0', 'Deep Neural Networks', 'We are looking for people who have done work in one of the following areas:']

['', 'Experience in developing, managing, and manipulating large, complex datasets', 'People: We have an audacious mission. We aim to fix the identity layer of the internet. Billions of people will live better lives with more trust and convenience thanks to\xa0ID.me. We are like Special Forces. We take on the most difficult challenges with amazing teammates.\xa0', 'Train and educate team members as well as stakeholders about best practices in data engineering and governance', 'Responsibilities', 'Orchestrate and maintain data pipelines that meet security standards and ensure the integrity and quality of data', 'Exceptional fluency with SQL; you conquered the join venn diagram long ago and have moved on to explaining cost based optimization to your peers on the engineering team', 'Demonstrate a passion for serving the needs of internal and external customers by enabling them with self-service reporting tools and analytics capabilities', 'Collaborate closely with the engineering and devops team to implement DataOps, thus reducing our analytics development cycle', 'ID.me', '3+ years of hands-on experience in data engineering for a SaaS company or a mature startupProven experience working with various tools but more importantly, familiarity with how to best assemble and deploy production ready data stack to any cloud environmentBS in a quantitative or scientific field such as computer science, computer engineering or equivalent experienceExperience in applying agile software development approach - Git, CI/CD, Jira, etc - to data engineeringFamiliar with SQL and other popular programming languages (such as Ruby, Python, .NET, etc)Exceptional fluency with SQL; you conquered the join venn diagram long ago and have moved on to explaining cost based optimization to your peers on the engineering teamSome level of experience working in the cloud - AWS, Azure, or GCPExperience with ingesting, processing, and visualizing data sources of varying types - structured/relational and unstructuredExperience in developing, managing, and manipulating large, complex datasetsData-driven, detail-oriented individual with excellent storytelling and problem-solving abilitiesAbility to work independently and autonomously, as well as part of a teamSuperb time management, prioritization of tasks and ability to meet deadlines with little supervision', 'ID.me is a digital identity network and our mission is to make the world a more trusted place by facilitating transparent and efficient interactions between people and organizations.\xa0', 'Qualifications', '3+ years of hands-on experience in data engineering for a SaaS company or a mature startup', 'Superb time management, prioritization of tasks and ability to meet deadlines with little supervision', 'Familiar with SQL and other popular programming languages (such as Ruby, Python, .NET, etc)', 'Vision: ', 'We are looking for a Data Engineer to join our Product team to design and build a robust set of tools and pipelines to support data analytics efforts. You’ll manage and optimize our core infrastructure by creating and maintaining data pipelines. You will work with other engineers and analysts from the Product and Business teams to design, implement, and maintain a data ecosystem that delivers actionable insights to make key business decisions. You have technical chops but can also work independently to prioritize issues, work within ambiguity, and manage conflicting deadlines. You are creative, data-driven, results-oriented, and eager to help us solve data problems of varying complexities.\xa0', 'Overview', "Vision: To be the world's leading digital identity network empowering people to control their own information and to prove their credentials across all channels: online, call center, and in-person.", "ID.me\xa0Core Values: *Don't be a jerk. *Always compete. *Ask questions like a 5-year old. *Inspire people with your passion. *Make something better every day. *Treat each customer like your favorite family member. *Own your mistakes so you can learn from them. *Details are everything. *Communicate like a scientist. *Be truthful (even when it's hard). *Reflect\xa0ID.me's values in your actions. *Act like an owner.", 'Understand the data related challenges, nuances, and requirements to identify and recommend the optimal technical approach', 'Research and improve our data platform to ingest, process, transform, and distribute insightful data to our audience ranging from executives, analysts, and engineers to customers, vendors, and partners', 'Experience with ingesting, processing, and visualizing data sources of varying types - structured/relational and unstructured', 'ID.me participates in E-Verify.', 'People', 'ID.me\xa0Core Values', 'Drive the execution of data initiatives that provide key performance metrics', 'Data-driven, detail-oriented individual with excellent storytelling and problem-solving abilities', '\xa0', 'Ability to work independently and autonomously, as well as part of a team', 'Develop technical solutions using proven techniques in data and analytics processes', 'Please review our Privacy Policy, including our CCPA policy, at id.me/privacy. If you provide ID.me with any personally identifiable information you confirm that you have read and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions set out in our Privacy Policy.', 'Evangelize data driven culture by breaking down silos and encouraging data sharing', 'Develop, prototype, and build frameworks based on open source and commercially available tools', 'Mission: To make the world a more trusted place by delivering the highest level of security with the least amount of friction at the lowest possible cost.', 'Proven experience working with various tools but more importantly, familiarity with how to best assemble and deploy production ready data stack to any cloud environment', 'BS in a quantitative or scientific field such as computer science, computer engineering or equivalent experience', 'Some level of experience working in the cloud - AWS, Azure, or GCP', "ID.me maintains a work environment free from discrimination, where employees are treated with dignity and respect. All ID.me employees share in the responsibility for fulfilling our commitment to equal employment opportunity. ID.me does not discriminate against any employee or applicant on the basis of age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. ID.me adheres to these principles in all aspects of employment, including recruitment, hiring, training, compensation, promotion, benefits, social and recreational programs, and discipline. In addition, ID.me's policy is to provide reasonable accommodation to qualified employees who have protected disabilities to the extent required by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances where a particular employee works. Upon request we will provide you with more information about such accommodations.", 'Develop technical solutions using proven techniques in data and analytics processesDevelop, prototype, and build frameworks based on open source and commercially available toolsOrchestrate and maintain data pipelines that meet security standards and ensure the integrity and quality of dataDemonstrate a passion for serving the needs of internal and external customers by enabling them with self-service reporting tools and analytics capabilitiesDrive the execution of data initiatives that provide key performance metricsUnderstand the data related challenges, nuances, and requirements to identify and recommend the optimal technical approachTrain and educate team members as well as stakeholders about best practices in data engineering and governanceCollaborate closely with the engineering and devops team to implement DataOps, thus reducing our analytics development cycleResearch and improve our data platform to ingest, process, transform, and distribute insightful data to our audience ranging from executives, analysts, and engineers to customers, vendors, and partnersEvangelize data driven culture by breaking down silos and encouraging data sharing', 'Experience in applying agile software development approach - Git, CI/CD, Jira, etc - to data engineering', 'Mission: ', 'ID.me Career Site & Culture Deck:\xa0https://www.id.me/careers']

['Work experience at another hedge fund in the area of quantitative research/analysis or data science. Fundamental investing exposure preferred. ', 'Strong knowledge of financial, mathematical and statistical theory and practice ', '\xa0 ', 'BS/MS/PhD in a hard science such as math, statistics, computer science, economics and/or engineering ', 'Understanding and experience with fundamental and alternative data would be preferred, including unstructured data. ', 'Role Responsibilities: ', '\xa0', 'The position requires both a strong quantitative/technical skill set in additional to an understanding/familiarity with the fundamental investment process as well (equities is preferred, but asset class experience is open). The successful candidate will also help build out the required technological infrastructure, including research frameworks and databases, to support their investment-related objectives. \xa0 ', 'Role Responsibilities:', 'Self-starter, entrepreneurial, and self-motivated personality', 'Qualifications: ', 'Qualifications:', 'Experience in Portfolio Analytics, Risk Modeling, and Portfolio Construction a plus ', 'Experience in performing ETL, analyzing and presenting data results to investors, and autonomous research processes. ', 'BS/MS/PhD in a hard science such as math, statistics, computer science, economics and/or engineering Work experience at another hedge fund in the area of quantitative research/analysis or data science. Fundamental investing exposure preferred. Strong knowledge of financial, mathematical and statistical theory and practice Experience in Portfolio Analytics, Risk Modeling, and Portfolio Construction a plus Understanding and experience with fundamental and alternative data would be preferred, including unstructured data. Experience in performing ETL, analyzing and presenting data results to investors, and autonomous research processes. Self-starter, entrepreneurial, and self-motivated personality', 'The successful candidate will be a key member of a small team of investment professionals where you will take full ownership of the data science work involving alternative data in your chosen sector (sector agnostic) and work in tandem with Portfolio Managers to build out full data projects that will provide actionable investment insights. The ideal candidate will be fully involved in every phase of the process including coming up with potential data ideas to explore, building out processes to capture new data, and ultimately providing recommendations/interpretations of the data to the investment teams. This individual will be responsible for integrating both alternative and fundamental data analysis into the team’s investment process. \xa0 ']

['', 'MSc or PhD in Computer Science (a focus on Machine Learning is an advantage), Statistics, Physics, Engineering or a related field.', 'Due to organic growth and strategic investment we are now seeking a Data Scientist in our Performance Analytics team. You will bring solid experience in the industrial asset management, smart manufacturing or renewable energy sectors to the expansion of our machine learning customer value proposition. This is a great opportunity to apply your technical knowledge to the renewable energy challenge within an innovative ‘scale-up’ organisation backed by one of the world’s largest energy companies.', 'ONYX InSight is independently incorporated in 5 locations globally, and wholly owned by the BP organisation. Renewable energy and wind power are in our DNA. We are excited about being part of BP’s low carbon and digital transformation and the opportunities this partnership presents for growth and career development for our colleagues.\xa0We actively encourage applications from under-represented groups in the STEM sector.\xa0\xa0', 'ONYX InSight is a growing technology and engineering organisation in the renewable energy sector. Our advanced sensing, software and machine learning products are deployed on wind turbines around the world. Headquartered in the UK, we also have global offices in the US, Australia, India and Korea.', 'Benefits', 'Person Specification', 'Develop innovative new approaches to solution development that contribute to ONYX’s IP value base.', 'Act as subject matter expert for the delivery of consultancy and customer projects requiring innovative Machine Learning solutions.', 'Minimum of 3 years’ experience as a data scientist in a renewable energy, smart manufacturing, industrial asset management field.Experience in a similar role at a wind turbine OEM, leading renewable power producer or consulting a significant advantage.Significant knowledge of one or more of: wind turbine and PV performance improvement; power curve improvement; power production forecasting; logistics optimization; O&M planning optimization.Strong experience with time series and modern ML stacks in Python; software product development or management experience an advantage.Practical understanding and hands on experience with various ML methods and latest research trends.Excellent communication skills - the ability to communicate through multiple channels.Works effectively to deadlines with minimum supervision; strong problem-solving skills; collaborates well with colleagues regionally and globally.MSc or PhD in Computer Science (a focus on Machine Learning is an advantage), Statistics, Physics, Engineering or a related field.Fluent in English (both written and spoken); right to work in the US.', 'Scope and specify one-off consultancy projects, working closely with the commercial team and engineering managers.', 'Translate these opportunities into requirements around asset performance management product specifications for Machine Learning systems.', 'Fluent in English (both written and spoken); right to work in the US.', 'Use your Machine Learning and Data Science skills to address climate change.', 'Develop solutions to translate specifications and requirements into deliverable products and solutions.', 'Experience in a similar role at a wind turbine OEM, leading renewable power producer or consulting a significant advantage.', 'Liaise with stakeholders (customers, academic partners, investors, colleagues) to identify key operating challenges in asset optimisation and performance.', 'Excellent communication skills - the ability to communicate through multiple channels.', 'Identify opportunities for the application of innovative machine learning techniques to support the optimisation of asset performance.', 'Works effectively to deadlines with minimum supervision; strong problem-solving skills; collaborates well with colleagues regionally and globally.', 'Strong experience with time series and modern ML stacks in Python; software product development or management experience an advantage.', 'Additional Information', 'Minimum of 3 years’ experience as a data scientist in a renewable energy, smart manufacturing, industrial asset management field.', 'Liaise with stakeholders (customers, academic partners, investors, colleagues) to identify key operating challenges in asset optimisation and performance.Identify opportunities for the application of innovative machine learning techniques to support the optimisation of asset performance.Translate these opportunities into requirements around asset performance management product specifications for Machine Learning systems.Develop solutions to translate specifications and requirements into deliverable products and solutions.Develop innovative new approaches to solution development that contribute to ONYX’s IP value base.Scope and specify one-off consultancy projects, working closely with the commercial team and engineering managers.Act as subject matter expert for the delivery of consultancy and customer projects requiring innovative Machine Learning solutions.', 'Significant knowledge of one or more of: wind turbine and PV performance improvement;
