job_title: Social Media and Data Analyst, Consultant
job_text: ['', 'Disclaimer', ' Data Analysis  : Apply a methodical and logical approach to analyze diverse data using a variety of tools and technologies, including NLP and machine learning tools. Be comfortable (and excited by) experimenting with new technologies and technical approaches. Use programming languages to perform sophisticated quantitative and qualitative analysis and visualization. ', ' Data visualization (e.g., Tableau, PowerBI, DASH, Gephi, i2 ANB, etc.) ', ' Personal and Family Sick Time & Company Paid Holidays ', ' Foreign language fluency (Arabic, Chinese, Farsi/Persian, Russian, Spanish preferred) ', 'Responsibilities', ' Data Collection ', ' Experience using technologies/tools such as: Traditional media and social media monitoring tools – Meltwater, BrandWatch, BuzzSumo, Crimson Hexagon, Factiva, Sysomos, NetBase, NUVI, Lexis Nexis, Cision, Critical Mention, Storyful, etc.  Open source intelligence (OSINT) tools – Maltego, Babel Street, Geospark, Dataminr, Sayari, etc.  Business intelligence tools – Lexis Nexis, Dun & Bradstreet, Dow Jones, Bloomberg, Credit Risk Monitor, etc. ', ' Communication ', ' Programming languages (e.g., R, Python, SQL, Oracle, etc.) ', ' Data Collection  : Identify and leverage open source and commercial data sources. Lead the development of data collection strategies; help identify relevant data sets and design consolidation pipelines. ', ' Data Interpretation ', ' Short-Term & Long-Term Disability ', 'Skills And Experience Desired', ' Traditional media and social media monitoring tools – Meltwater, BrandWatch, BuzzSumo, Crimson Hexagon, Factiva, Sysomos, NetBase, NUVI, Lexis Nexis, Cision, Critical Mention, Storyful, etc.  Open source intelligence (OSINT) tools – Maltego, Babel Street, Geospark, Dataminr, Sayari, etc.  Business intelligence tools – Lexis Nexis, Dun & Bradstreet, Dow Jones, Bloomberg, Credit Risk Monitor, etc. ', ' Guidehouse does not accept unsolicited resumes through or from search firms or staffing agencies. All unsolicited resumes will be considered the property of Guidehouse and Guidehouse will not be obligated to pay a placement fee. ', ' Medical, Rx, Dental & Vision Insurance ', ' Corporate Sponsored Events & Community Outreach ', ' Innovation & Creative Problem Solving ', " Bachelor's Degree in a related field  At least one year of relevant experience conducting open sources analysis, intelligence gathering, traditional/social media monitoring, or investigations  Previous experience working as a data scientist/analyst (i.e., not just a user of commercial tools, but experience in also building news tools/technical capabilities). At least one year of hands-on experience in analyzing large data sets.  Strong proficiency of technical skills related to data analysis Programming languages (e.g., R, Python, SQL, Oracle, etc.)  Data visualization (e.g., Tableau, PowerBI, DASH, Gephi, i2 ANB, etc.)  Experience using technologies/tools such as: Traditional media and social media monitoring tools – Meltwater, BrandWatch, BuzzSumo, Crimson Hexagon, Factiva, Sysomos, NetBase, NUVI, Lexis Nexis, Cision, Critical Mention, Storyful, etc.  Open source intelligence (OSINT) tools – Maltego, Babel Street, Geospark, Dataminr, Sayari, etc.  Business intelligence tools – Lexis Nexis, Dun & Bradstreet, Dow Jones, Bloomberg, Credit Risk Monitor, etc.  Experience building and leveraging business resources and processes to accomplish complex tasks, such as developing new tools, pipelines, and methodologies  Innate curiosity that drives an interest in how to use technology/tools and data to solve problems and innovate  Strong attention to detail and accuracy  Personal and professional integrity to strictly adhere to restrictions and necessary discretion ", ' Business Development  : Lead and develop business opportunities and develop client relationships. Participate in the coordination and composition of business development requirements, including crafting responses to requests for information and proposals, identifying and organizing past performance qualifications, and participating in general BD opportunity shaping activities. ', 'Qualifications', ' Medical, Rx, Dental & Vision Insurance  Personal and Family Sick Time & Company Paid Holidays  Parental Leave and Adoption Assistance  401(k) Retirement Plan  Basic Life & Supplemental Life  Health Savings Account, Dental/Vision & Dependent Care Flexible Spending Accounts  Short-Term & Long-Term Disability  Tuition Reimbursement, Personal Development & Learning Opportunities  Skills Development & Certifications  Employee Referral Program  Corporate Sponsored Events & Community Outreach Emergency Back-Up Childcare Program', 'About Guidehouse', ' Manage project streams and outputs to deliver open source research, analysis, intelligence, and solutions to our clients ', ' Project Management  : Develop project work streams and effectively manage project delivery on time and within budget. Contribute to multiple projects simultaneously, with the ability to deliver high quality work under tight deadlines. ', ' Programming languages (e.g., R, Python, SQL, Oracle, etc.)  Data visualization (e.g., Tableau, PowerBI, DASH, Gephi, i2 ANB, etc.) ', ' Collaboration  : Drive collaboration internally to develop new technical approaches, methodologies, and tools to tackle common open source data issues. Work as part of a cross-functional team. ', 'Overview', 'Rewards And Benefits', ' 401(k) Retirement Plan ', ' Communication  : Communicate well in-person and in writing. Craft compelling communications for our clients, future business prospects, and internally. ', ' Tuition Reimbursement, Personal Development & Learning Opportunities ', ' Project Management ', ' Business intelligence tools – Lexis Nexis, Dun & Bradstreet, Dow Jones, Bloomberg, Credit Risk Monitor, etc. ', ' Previous experience working as a data scientist/analyst (i.e., not just a user of commercial tools, but experience in also building news tools/technical capabilities). At least one year of hands-on experience in analyzing large data sets. ', ' Use established data science and analysis processes to rapidly parse through big data and identify relevant insights ', ' Traditional media and social media monitoring tools – Meltwater, BrandWatch, BuzzSumo, Crimson Hexagon, Factiva, Sysomos, NetBase, NUVI, Lexis Nexis, Cision, Critical Mention, Storyful, etc. ', ' Master’s Degree in a related field ', ' Parental Leave and Adoption Assistance ', ' Health Savings Account, Dental/Vision & Dependent Care Flexible Spending Accounts ', ' Active USG clearance strongly preferred (Secret or above) ', 'Emergency Back-Up Childcare Program', ' Innate curiosity that drives an interest in how to use technology/tools and data to solve problems and innovate ', ' Manage project streams and outputs to deliver open source research, analysis, intelligence, and solutions to our clients  Use established data science and analysis processes to rapidly parse through big data and identify relevant insights  Innovation & Creative Problem Solving  : Have a significant technology-first problem solving mindset. Actively participate in designing and building new methodologies, tools, technologies, and solutions for ambiguous and hard-to-define problem sets that require multidisciplinary thinking, technical development, and creative solutioning.  Data Collection  : Identify and leverage open source and commercial data sources. Lead the development of data collection strategies; help identify relevant data sets and design consolidation pipelines.  Data Analysis  : Apply a methodical and logical approach to analyze diverse data using a variety of tools and technologies, including NLP and machine learning tools. Be comfortable (and excited by) experimenting with new technologies and technical approaches. Use programming languages to perform sophisticated quantitative and qualitative analysis and visualization.  Data Interpretation  : Translate analytic findings into actionable outcomes for our clients. Communicate complex concepts with clarity for a wide range of clients. Lead the shaping and development of reports and other deliverables that place quantitative and qualitative findings in strategic context and provide recommendations based on insight, direction and guidance identified in the research completed.  Project Management  : Develop project work streams and effectively manage project delivery on time and within budget. Contribute to multiple projects simultaneously, with the ability to deliver high quality work under tight deadlines.  Communication  : Communicate well in-person and in writing. Craft compelling communications for our clients, future business prospects, and internally.  Collaboration  : Drive collaboration internally to develop new technical approaches, methodologies, and tools to tackle common open source data issues. Work as part of a cross-functional team.  Business Development  : Lead and develop business opportunities and develop client relationships. Participate in the coordination and composition of business development requirements, including crafting responses to requests for information and proposals, identifying and organizing past performance qualifications, and participating in general BD opportunity shaping activities. ', ' At least one year of relevant experience conducting open sources analysis, intelligence gathering, traditional/social media monitoring, or investigations ', " Bachelor's Degree in a related field ", ' Previous experience collecting and analyzing information from the darknet and/or monitoring illicit sites ', ' Experience building and leveraging business resources and processes to accomplish complex tasks, such as developing new tools, pipelines, and methodologies ', ' Business Development ', ' Open source intelligence (OSINT) tools – Maltego, Babel Street, Geospark, Dataminr, Sayari, etc. ', ' Data Interpretation  : Translate analytic findings into actionable outcomes for our clients. Communicate complex concepts with clarity for a wide range of clients. Lead the shaping and development of reports and other deliverables that place quantitative and qualitative findings in strategic context and provide recommendations based on insight, direction and guidance identified in the research completed. ', ' Master’s Degree in a related field  Active USG clearance strongly preferred (Secret or above)  Foreign language fluency (Arabic, Chinese, Farsi/Persian, Russian, Spanish preferred)  Previous experience collecting and analyzing information from the darknet and/or monitoring illicit sites  Previous experience overseeing the work of others  Previous intelligence analysis training/experience from US Government or commercial firm or OSINT related certifications ', ' Previous experience overseeing the work of others ', ' Skills Development & Certifications ', ' Employee Referral Program ', ' Collaboration ', ' Basic Life & Supplemental Life ', ' Personal and professional integrity to strictly adhere to restrictions and necessary discretion ', 'Additional Requirements', ' Previous intelligence analysis training/experience from US Government or commercial firm or OSINT related certifications ', 'Skills And Experience Required', ' Innovation & Creative Problem Solving  : Have a significant technology-first problem solving mindset. Actively participate in designing and building new methodologies, tools, technologies, and solutions for ambiguous and hard-to-define problem sets that require multidisciplinary thinking, technical development, and creative solutioning. Develop and maintain working knowledge of commonly used spectroscopic, chromatographic and wet chemistry procedures.Work with various analytical methods including cleaning verification, assay and impurities, dissolution, residual solvents for raw materials, in-process samples or finished products testing.Understand and conduct studies for method development/evaluation, validation, transfer and verification according to scientific justifications and current regulatory guidance (e.g., ICH, FDA, USP, EP, etc.).Prepare and review technical documents, including validation/transfer/verification protocols and reports, analytical test procedures, technical reports, analytical investigations, etc. for review.Understand drug product formulations, manufacturing process and work closely with product development and process transfer teams on testing of product development and process validation batches and providing proper data interpretation as necessary. Catalent is an exciting and growing international company where employees work directly with pharma, biopharma and consumer health companies of all sizes to advance new medicines from early development to clinical trials and to the market. Catalent produces more than 70 billion doses per year, and each one will be used by someone who is counting on us. Join us in making a difference. ['', 'Demonstrated ability to quickly learn, improve, and implement new methods from publications.', 'IDEAYA is seeking a South San Francisco based Research Scientist for our Pharmacology and Toxicology group. This individual will play a key role in the development and execution of preclinical models to understand the efficacy and PK/PD relationships of our small molecule agents under development for the treatment of cancer. The ideal candidate will enjoy working with multi-disciplinary teams in a fast-paced environment and will have the passion to contribute to the discovery and development of novel therapeutic agents for cancer patients.', 'Ability to effectively design, plan, execute, and analyze experiments independently', 'BS/MS and 8+ years of work experience, or PhD in biology, bioengineering, or related field with 0-3 years’ experiencePractical laboratory experience with patient derived cells/organoids and other 3D culture model systems, including the application of high-resolution imaging and microscopy methodologies, is highly desirableExperience with data processing and data analysis of large volumes of data is a plusExperience with automation is a plusDemonstrated ability to quickly learn, improve, and implement new methods from publications.Ability to effectively design, plan, execute, and analyze experiments independentlyExperience with compound and genetic screening is a plusAbility to troubleshoot problems, and provide possible solutionsStrong interpersonal skills and the ability to effectively communicate with multiple research teams.Efficient time management and the ability to work on several projects simultaneously', 'Ability to troubleshoot problems, and provide possible solutions', 'Experience with data processing and data analysis of large volumes of data is a plus', 'Communicate study results to multiple stakeholders within the organization.', 'Experience with automation is a plus', 'BS/MS and 8+ years of work experience, or PhD in biology, bioengineering, or related field with 0-3 years’ experience', 'Lead the development and implementation of assays for screening new potential therapeutics', 'About IDEAYA Biosciences:', 'IDEAYA Biosciences (NASDAQ: IDYA) is a public, clinical-stage oncology-focused precision medicine company committed to the discovery and development of targeted therapeutics for patient populations selected using DNA sequencing and other molecular diagnostics. Our approach integrates extensive capabilities in identifying and validating translational biomarkers with small molecule drug discovery to select patient populations most likely to benefit from the therapies we are developing. We are applying these capabilities across multiple classes of precision medicine, including direct targeting of oncogenic pathways and synthetic lethality – which represents an emerging class of precision medicine targets. We believe this diversified approach will enable us to deliver the right medicine to the right patient to drive a more robust clinical response.', 'IDEAYA recently announced a landmark strategic partnership with GSK in Synthetic Lethality for certain pipeline programs. The GSK partnership is transformative and enables IDEAYA and GSK to collectively build an industry leading platform and pipeline in Synthetic Lethality. For more information, please see\xa0www.ideayabio.com.', 'Play a key role in evaluating mechanistic hypotheses for drug responses using cancer cell lines, patient derived cell lines, spheroids, organoids, and other 3D culture models, by combining high content imaging and molecular biology techniques to achieve gene modulation and interrogate pathways of interest', 'Contribute to method development for new in vitro disease models, experimental protocols, and related readouts for specific project needs', 'Efficient time management and the ability to work on several projects simultaneously', 'Experience with compound and genetic screening is a plus', "When you're at IDEAYA, you will be in the midst of brilliant minds working on precision medicine therapies to help cancer patients. We are passionate and committed about being on the forefront of oncology medicine, which means we all have a high internal drive that is at the very core of every person at IDEAYA. We are inquisitive, ask deep questions, and are data-driven innovators who like to collaborate and use team work to move science forward.", 'Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to effectively communicate with multiple research teams.', 'Benefits:', 'Position Summary:', 'Practical laboratory experience with patient derived cells/organoids and other 3D culture model systems, including the application of high-resolution imaging and microscopy methodologies, is highly desirable', "What you'll do:", 'Play a key role in evaluating mechanistic hypotheses for drug responses using cancer cell lines, patient derived cell lines, spheroids, organoids, and other 3D culture models, by combining high content imaging and molecular biology techniques to achieve gene modulation and interrogate pathways of interestLead the development and implementation of assays for screening new potential therapeuticsContribute to method development for new in vitro disease models, experimental protocols, and related readouts for specific project needsDocument all laboratory activities, protocols, analysis methods, and the collection of dataCommunicate study results to multiple stakeholders within the organization.', 'What you will bring:', 'Ideaya is an equal opportunity employer. In accordance with applicable law, Ideaya does not discriminate in hiring or otherwise in employment based on race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, marital or veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or any other legally protected status. EOE/AA/Vets.', 'Document all laboratory activities, protocols, analysis methods, and the collection of data']

['', 'Investigate the biological origin of blood-based biomarkers by performing detailed characterization of cell-free material, tumor tissues, and the immune system.\xa0', 'Collaborate with computational biologists and software engineers to build analysis pipelines that appropriately integrate new molecular technologies.', 'Develop and employ novel assays to discover and quantify protein biomarkers in clinical samples by applying expert knowledge of analytical chemistry and biochemistry.', 'Proven track record of establishing or evaluating new proteomics assays for biomarker discovery and protein quantitation, including mass spectrometry and immunoaffinity approaches at the global and targeted scales.', 'What does a successful person look like at Freenome?', 'Refine existing proteomics assays by characterizing assay performance and implementing workflow and protocol improvements (including biofluid sample collection, protein extraction and depletion, and quantitation on discovery or targeted platforms).', 'Our Culture', 'We have pioneered the most comprehensive multiomics platform for early cancer detection through a routine blood draw.\xa0By combining deep expertise in molecular biology with advanced computational biology and machine learning techniques to recognize disease-associated patterns among billions of circulating, cell-free biomarkers, we are developing simple and accurate blood tests for early cancer detection and integrating the actionable insights into health systems to operationalize a machine learning feedback loop between care and science.\xa0', 'What you bring:', 'Our recent $270 Million Series C brings our financing to over $500 million from investors, including;\xa0Bain Capital, Perceptive Advisors, RA Capital, Polaris Partners, Andreessen Horowitz, funds and accounts advised by T. Rowe Price Associates, Inc., GV (formerly Google Ventures), Roche Venture Fund, Kaiser Permanente Ventures, American Cancer Society’s BrightEdge Ventures, Data Collective Venture Capital, Novartis and Verily Life Sciences.\xa0', 'How you’ll contribute:', 'Experience managing Contract Research Organizations (CROs) preferred.', 'Ability to perform basic data analysis to enable experimental iteration independent of external support. ', 'Freenome is building technology to advance the understanding of cancer through multiple analytes derived from blood. These signals include cell-free DNA, methylation of cell-free DNA, cell-free RNA, circulating proteins, and immune profiling derived from thousands of prospective samples. By developing novel statistical learning methods and applying them to integrate various -omics datasets, Freenome is a leader in modeling specific biological mechanisms to capture disease-dependent signatures including gene expression, immune response, tumor burden, the tissue of origin, and 3D chromatin structure.\xa0', 'Our Science', '\xa0', 'Identify and evaluate opportunities to integrate new technologies into our multi-omics platform and products.', 'Clear communications skills and ability to work with team members in the same and adjacent disciplines. Experience mentoring and training research associates desired.', 'Develop and employ novel assays to discover and quantify protein biomarkers in clinical samples by applying expert knowledge of analytical chemistry and biochemistry.Identify and evaluate opportunities to integrate new technologies into our multi-omics platform and products.Refine existing proteomics assays by characterizing assay performance and implementing workflow and protocol improvements (including biofluid sample collection, protein extraction and depletion, and quantitation on discovery or targeted platforms).Investigate the biological origin of blood-based biomarkers by performing detailed characterization of cell-free material, tumor tissues, and the immune system.\xa0Drive biomarker discovery studies that leverage both in-house generated datasets and published reference databases.Collaborate with computational biologists and software engineers to build analysis pipelines that appropriately integrate new molecular technologies.', 'We value empathy, integrity, and trust in one another and we respect the diverse perspectives of our colleagues and of those we serve.\xa0We assume positive intent and give each other the benefit of the doubt with the firm belief that we are a team working toward the same objectives.\xa0We believe in empowering and supporting each other in a collaborative and dynamic environment.\xa0', 'Freenome is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity. Freenome does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, national origin, veteran status, or any other basis covered by appropriate law.', 'PhD (or equivalent industry experience) in molecular biology, biochemistry, chemistry, or a related field, with a background in cancer biology, immunology, or epigenetics', 'About the Role', 'Freenome is on a mission to empower everyone with the tools they need to detect, treat, and ultimately prevent cancer.', 'At Freenome, our goal is to improve patient outcomes by pioneering the next-generation of blood tests for early and accurate disease detection using our combined multi-omics and machine learning platform. As a Senior Research Scientist in Proteomics, you will contribute to the program’s technical base by creating and optimizing new assays and workflows for protein biomarker discovery (including mass spectrometry and immunoaffinity approaches), and to the program’s scientific base by elevating our understanding of the biological context of these assay signals. In this role, you will evaluate emergent technologies that have the potential to improve our diagnostic tests, collect and analyze proteomics data for biomarker discovery, and augment existing multi-omic models with novel signals you discover. You will also work closely with computational biologists and machine learning scientists to provide biological and technical insights and to provide new data sources to enhance ongoing computational research projects.', 'PhD (or equivalent industry experience) in molecular biology, biochemistry, chemistry, or a related field, with a background in cancer biology, immunology, or epigenetics3+ years of post-PhD experience in proteomics assay development or biomarker discoveryProven track record of establishing or evaluating new proteomics assays for biomarker discovery and protein quantitation, including mass spectrometry and immunoaffinity approaches at the global and targeted scales.Experience with multiplexed and/or high-throughput analytical platforms (e.g., peptide arrays, protein arrays, Luminex, Olink, MSD) desired.Experience managing Contract Research Organizations (CROs) preferred.Ability to perform basic data analysis to enable experimental iteration independent of external support. Clear communications skills and ability to work with team members in the same and adjacent disciplines. Experience mentoring and training research associates desired.', 'About Freenome', 'By building comprehensive discovery datasets and modeling critical biological systems, Freenome is learning what biological changes are present within the blood between a variety of different disease states including cancer, autoimmune disorders, infections, drug response, and aging. The synthesis of Freenome’s datasets, cross-functional technical expertise, and intrepid mission to discover biological truth, we seek to improve the lives of millions through early detection and early treatment of disease.\xa0\xa0', 'Those who thrive at Freenome prioritize, manage, and execute their own goals with ownership and in alignment with those of the company. They embrace our values of empathy, integrity, striving for greatness, servant leadership, and trust, and hold themselves and their team accountable to these values. They crave collaboration with brilliant minds from disparate fields of study and believe that hiring and mentorship are fundamental to our success. Above all, they welcome and provide constructive feedback and criticism, trusting in the good intentions of others, and being secure in the knowledge that embracing mistakes is the best way to learn and grow. For those who pursue challenges, understudied problems, and want the opportunity to see their work impact the lives of millions of people affected by cancer every year, there’s no better place to be than Freenome.', '3+ years of post-PhD experience in proteomics assay development or biomarker discovery', 'Experience with multiplexed and/or high-throughput analytical platforms (e.g., peptide arrays, protein arrays, Luminex, Olink, MSD) desired.', 'Drive biomarker discovery studies that leverage both in-house generated datasets and published reference databases.', 'Senior Research Scientist - Proteomics', 'Freenomers are technical, creative, visionary, grounded, empathetic, and passionate. We build teams around divergent expertise, allowing us to solve problems and ascertain opportunities in unique ways. Freenomers are some of the most talented experts in their fields, joining together to advance healthcare, one breakthrough at a time.\xa0']

', 'We offer flexible work arrangements allowing our team members to work when they feel best. ', ' Diversity & Inclusion at Automattic', 'We’re improving diversity in the tech industry. We require unconscious bias training for our hiring teams and ensure our products are accessible across different bandwidths and devices. Read more about our dedication to diversity and inclusion. ['', ' • Strong project management skills ', " • Master's degree is a plus but not required (epidemiology, biostatistics, public health or biological sciences).", ' Required Experience and Skills: ', " • Bachelor's degree required (areas such as public health, epidemiology, biostatistics, behavioral sciences or biological sciences). ", ' • Budget/Financial experience is helpful ', ' • Previous experience supporting operational aspects of clinical/observational research with 2-3 years related job experience, or equivalent. ', ' • Must have strong communication and organizational skills ', '\xa0', ' • Familiar with assessing Fair Market Value (FMV) beneficial but not required. ', 'Qualifications:', ' Under general supervision of the Associate Director of Strategy and Operations within Center for Observational and Real-World Evidence (CORE), the Sourcing Operations Manager provides support in the planning and startup activities of an observational or non-interventional research study. Working with the Study Lead, activities supported by the Supplier Manager may include preparing a request for proposal, assisting in the bid comparisons and reviewing the Product of work and corresponding budget. Depending on the project, there may be a need for a Fair Market Value analysis and/or different compliance activities. The types of projects included may include primary data collection studies, chart review studies, database studies and molecular epidemiology studies, dossiers, lit reviews, etc. In addition to assisting the CORE scientist, the Sourcing Operations Manager will also liaise with members of Procurement and an internal team within the department that manages the creation of purchase orders. Will be assigned to support multiple projects at the same time to shepherd them through the various sourcing and start-up activities. Troubleshoots different sourcing or Fair Market Value issues as they arise and works to bring to timely resolution. May participate in different improvement initiatives, training re-design or metrics development. Must be able to work in a team as well as independently and strong project management skills are essential in order to manage competing priorities.', ' Responsibilities:', ' • Basic knowledge of epidemiologic or outcomes research ', 'Location; West Point, PA - Philadelphia, PA or Rahway, NJ  locations are all acceptable\xa0', ' • Pharmaceutical experience is preferred.']

The client's work is built on a foundation of best-in-class research capability, and a commitment to honesty, transparency, and professionalism, that continually provide top-tier service for clients worldwide.", 'Why we are different', 'Detail-oriented\xa0', 'With minimal supervision, the\xa0Researcher will work with the research director as a member of the research team in assessing cases that present a financial opportunity for ARB. job_text: ['', 'Casual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0\xa0', 'Principal Data Engineer | AWS, Data System Transformation | Top 5 Hedge Fund in Boston', 'Act as a critical thought leader, consulting and mentoring other teams as your new systems transform the way this entire firm leverages data', 'Introduce and evaluate cutting edge Big Data, HPC, and Cloud technologies to build critical, highly complex distributed system from scratchLead the migration to AWS as a hands-on technical leaderAct as a critical thought leader, consulting and mentoring other teams as your new systems transform the way this entire firm leverages data', 'Lead the migration to AWS as a hands-on technical leader', 'Required Qualifications:\xa0', 'Experience with Docker or Kubernetes', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation packageOne of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the businessCasual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility', 'BS or equivalent degree8+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experienceSignificant expertise with multiple AWS services (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)Expertise with Python, Spark, and Hadoop', 'BS or equivalent degree', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation package', '8+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experience', 'Experience working in Financial Services, ideally supporting performance sensitive trading systems', 'Expertise with Python, Spark, and Hadoop', '\xa0', 'In this role, you will architect and implement AWS and other Big Data solutions to massively increase the scale of data that the quantitative research, analytics, and trading teams are able to leverage. This team has already identified AWS, Python, Big Data, and HPC technologies to build their initial POCs, but you will be asked to introduce new technologies as development progresses.', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0', 'One of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the business', 'Experience working in Financial Services, ideally supporting performance sensitive trading systemsExperience with Docker or Kubernetes', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Introduce and evaluate cutting edge Big Data, HPC, and Cloud technologies to build critical, highly complex distributed system from scratch', 'Required Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', 'Capitalize on:', 'Significant expertise with multiple AWS services (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)', "One of Boston's top Hedge Funds has had an elite track record of success over the past 4.5 years; they have doubled their AUM, and now have $100+ Billion in AUM. They are building out a new cloud team to redefine the scope and performance of their data processing systems and infrastructure. This team will work in a greenfield environment, designing brand new systems from scratch."]

['', 'Job Information', 'INL Mission', 'The person chosen for this position will also lead internally funded Laboratory Directed R&D (LDRD) projects and mentor technical staff on cybersecurity research efforts that are aligned to N&HS strategy and goals.', 'National Laboratory, Department of Energy, or Department of Defense-related experience a plus.', ' Applicants must have a Ph.D. in Computer Science or closely related field plus 10 years work experience, with a strong dedication to research and education in cybersecurity. U.S. citizenship required. Able to acquire and maintain a DOE Q clearance and special accesses as the need arises. Deep research experience in operational technology (OT) systems and embedded systems. Practical work experience outside of academia. ', ' Salary Grade: 250 ', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', 'Deep research experience in operational technology (OT) systems and embedded systems.', 'INL Vision', 'Other Information', 'Primary Location', 'Schedule', 'Job', "The Senior Cybersecurity Scientist will coordinate efforts across INL’s multidisciplinary research areas, informed by INL's threat analysts, sector experts, and experiments leveraging our Critical Infrastructure Test Range Complex, as well as external partners (National Laboratories, Universities, Industry, and Government stakeholders) to improve research impact.", 'Minimum Requirements', 'Organization', 'INL Overview', 'Selective Service Requirements', " The Senior Cybersecurity Scientist will coordinate efforts across INL’s multidisciplinary research areas, informed by INL's threat analysts, sector experts, and experiments leveraging our Critical Infrastructure Test Range Complex, as well as external partners (National Laboratories, Universities, Industry, and Government stakeholders) to improve research impact. Through the development of innovative and outstanding research programs, the Senior Cybersecurity Scientist will add depth and experience to INL’s cybersecurity R&D team by attracting and retaining best-in-class research talent. The Senior Cybersecurity Scientist will participate in both national and international forums for the development of significant new concepts or novel approaches to control systems cybersecurity. The person chosen for this position will also lead internally funded Laboratory Directed R&D (LDRD) projects and mentor technical staff on cybersecurity research efforts that are aligned to N&HS strategy and goals. ", 'Preferred Requirements', ' National Laboratory, Department of Energy, or Department of Defense-related experience a plus. ', 'FULL-TIME ', 'Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. ', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. ', '2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). ', 'Required Experience/Skills:', 'Data Scientist ', 'The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. ', 'This position is integrated into the development team and responsible for research and development around algorithm strategies, pricing signals, and TCA.  The position also will work with salespeople and clients to explain and customize our execution offering. ', 'Data Scientist', 'Position Description ', 'Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. ', 'The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. ', 'Familiarity with some or all of these technologies is required - JUnit testing, Unix environment, multi-threaded programming and NoSQL databases.', 'Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. ', 'Required Experience/Skills: ', ' ', 'NEW YORK ', 'Position Description', 'Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. 2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. Familiarity with some or all of these technologies is required - JUnit testing, Unix environment, multi-threaded programming and NoSQL databases.', 'Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. ', 'Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. ']

company: Gene Therapy Program | University of Pennsylvania
job_text: ['', 'Qualified candidates will have expertise with in vitro and in vivo experiments as well as a background in various disease models,\xa0', 'As a Postdoc/Research Specialist D, in collaboration with your Research Director and other Investigators on your team, you will execute on designed work plans. You will be working in the setting of large interdisciplinary teams, where you will function with limited oversight in the execution of in vitro and in vivo experiments while working cross-functionally with core labs and resources. With oversight of the Research Director, you will perform design, optimize, and implement complex experiments within specified timelines. You will work closely with the research director to assure that the research program adheres to the work plan and stays within budget. Also, you will have the opportunity to present research externally and you may contribute to writing/reviewing manuscripts, protocols, and SOPs.', 'Joining GTP offers scientific professionals the unique opportunity of seeing their research go from bench to bedside and discoveries that could one day lead to cures.', 'Due to the continued growth of our program, we are searching for a new Postdoc/Research Specialist D to collaborate on gene therapeutic development research projects to treat or cure rare disease, performing both theoretical and bench research.\xa0', 'Ph.D. degree in the field of immunology, molecular biology, gene therapy, or related fields required.\xa0Experience working with small animal models requiredMust thrive in a team environment, be an independent/critical thinker, have excellent written and oral communication skills, and ability to prioritize/multitask in a fast-paced environment.', 'Penn adheres to a policy that prohibits discrimination on the basis of race, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, religion, creed, national or ethnic origin, citizenship status, age, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected class.', 'Experience working with small animal models required', 'Postdoc/Research Specialist D', 'The Gene Therapy Program (GTP) is entering a new era of unprecedented opportunity with great potential to reshape the face of medicine as we know it. Our discoveries have set the stage for successful treatments and possibly even cures for devastating genetic diseases.\xa0', 'As a top candidate, you will possess: ', 'The laboratory of Dr. Jim Wilson, at\xa0GTP\xa0of the University of Pennsylvania, has been a leader in the development of innovative vector technology for close to three decades. We have emerged as the ‘go-to’ organization for public and private partners, who want to participate in the gene therapy space. Currently, we are positioned to lead another round of vector innovation and establish pre-clinical and clinical proof-of-concept in therapeutic applications of in-vivo genome editing.', 'Must thrive in a team environment, be an independent/critical thinker, have excellent written and oral communication skills, and ability to prioritize/multitask in a fast-paced environment.', 'Ph.D. degree in the field of immunology, molecular biology, gene therapy, or related fields required.\xa0']

teams.Collect, analyze, and synthesis data to provide meaningful insights to our product development team.Mentor junior researchers so they may support their businesses.', 'Advanced research and years of experience in the field or related field.', 'Create surveys and administer to our audiences to collect meaningful feedback.', 'Present learnings and design recommendations from research methods in a digestible manner to internal and external teams.', 'For more information, visit\xa0https://redventures.com\xa0and follow @RedVentures on social platforms.', 'A series of research methods disability, age, genetic information, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy or any other basis protected by law. Employment at Red Ventures is based solely on a person's merit and qualifications.\xa0\xa0", 'We are committed to providing equal employment opportunities to qualified individuals with disabilities. This includes providing reasonable accommodation where appropriate. Should you require a reasonable accommodation to apply or participate in the job application or interview process, please contact\xa0accommodation@redventures.com.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '5+ years of experience in the field or related field.Understanding of WCAG 2.1 AA requirements and digital accessibility requirements.\xa0Experience using digital design tools for wireframing, prototyping, and virtual collaboration such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, Figma, Invision, Abstract, Miro, Axure, Lucid, etc.Portfolio of work as a research practitioner on large end-to-end projects, demonstrating craft: from screener and test plan creation, to moderation/facilitation, and storytelling to socialize results and recommendations.Experience with advanced research strategies across multiple teams.A series of research methods in your toolbox and are ready to execute at any given time (ex. ethnographic field studies, concept testing, A/B testing, usability testing, diary studies, customer feedback, card sorting, tree sorts, focus groups, inteviews, competitor analysis, heuristic analysis, etc.)\xa0Advanced experience with tools to support data collction such as Qualtrics, SurveyMoney, UserTesting.com, etc.\xa0Strong understanding of the media landscape and major trends in the industry.', 'RV Healthline is seeking a Senior UX Researcher with a passion to drive deeper understandings of our audiences across our fast-moving media and product platforms. This role will work alongside multiple teams made up of product managers, product designers, content strategists, and front-end engineers. The ideal candidate has advanced research methods, design processes, and has a passion for health, wellness, and helping others live stronger and healthier lives. Design and technical literacy are key as you will be responsible for communicating research findings to help project teams recognize opportunities to move the product forward.', '\xa0', 'Understanding of WCAG 2.1 AA requirements and digital accessibility requirements.\xa0', 'Strong understanding of the media landscape and major trends in the industry.', 'What You’ll Do: ', 'Conduct moderated and unmoderated user interviews to obtain feedback.', 'Collect, analyze, and synthesis data to provide meaningful insights to our product development team.', 'Mentor junior researchers so they may support their businesses.', 'Advanced experience with tools to support data collction such as Qualtrics, SurveyMoney, UserTesting.com, etc.\xa0', 'We offer competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits program for full-time employees, including medical, dental and vision coverage, paid time off, life insurance, disability coverage, employee assistance program, 401(k) plan and a paid parental leave program.\xa0', 'Over the last twenty years, Red Ventures has built a portfolio of influential brands, digital platforms, and strategic partnerships that work together to connect millions of people with expert advice. Through premium content and personalized digital experiences, Red Ventures builds online journeys that make it easier for people to make important decisions about their homes, health, travel, finances, education and entertainment. Founded in 2000, Red Ventures has 3,000 employees in 10 cities across the US, as well as in the UK and Brazil. Red Ventures owns and operates several large digital brands including Healthline, The Points Guy, Bankrate, MYMOVE, and Allconnect.com.\xa0']

['', 'Intellectual Properties', 'You are based in Calhoun and will report to the IP Legal Manager, based in Belgium.', 'MARKET RESEARCHER', 'You are willing to spend up to 50% of your time travelling. You go to the different points of sales (shops, outlet stores …) in order to look for potential violations. You record the irregularities by taking pictures, buying the products and sending samples to our Belgium office. At the same time you check how the products are displayed and collect the relevant information about products and competition. ', ' You start with an extended training on our patented and licensed flooring products. Due to these trainings you will become an expert in the full range of our licensed products. This knowledge will enable you to analyze if different products in the market are violating our portfolio. Once you are an expert you will focus on market research. You will map in US all products and producers of hard floor covering. This involves studying all the different laminate floor producers and their respective products, but also the producers of parquet, cork and veneer floors … and their respective products. This means a lot of desk research (internet, magazines …) but also visiting fairs and doing trips within US & Canada. You are willing to spend up to 50% of your time travelling. You go to the different points of sales (shops, outlet stores …) in order to look for potential violations. You record the irregularities by taking pictures, buying the products and sending samples to our Belgium office. At the same time you check how the products are displayed and collect the relevant information about products and competition.  When you are back at the office, you execute small tests on the samples and you write reports about your visits and keep the exhibits which will enable the legal department to take the necessary actions. These actions include sending warning letters to the shops. You will be involved in the drawing of these letters and you are responsible for the follow-up of it. You are based in Calhoun and will report to the IP Legal Manager, based in Belgium. ', 'Profile', 'You have very strong administration skills one the one hand and have a taste for adventure on the other hand. ', 'You have preferably at least a bachelor degree (marketing, sales, law or general economics). A first professional experience or experience in market research is an asset although not a must. ', 'You are of an independent nature as the role will entail long periods of individual travel.', 'You start with an extended training on our patented and licensed flooring products. Due to these trainings you will become an expert in the full range of our licensed products. This knowledge will enable you to analyze if different products in the market are violating our portfolio.', 'You have a good feeling with technical products.', 'When you are back at the office, you execute small tests on the samples and you write reports about your visits and keep the exhibits which will enable the legal department to take the necessary actions. These actions include sending warning letters to the shops. You will be involved in the drawing of these letters and you are responsible for the follow-up of it.', ' You have preferably at least a bachelor degree (marketing, sales, law or general economics). A first professional experience or experience in market research is an asset although not a must.  You have a good feeling with technical products. You have very strong administration skills one the one hand and have a taste for adventure on the other hand.  You are of an independent nature as the role will entail long periods of individual travel. ', 'Once you are an expert you will focus on market research. You will map in US all products and producers of hard floor covering. This involves studying all the different laminate floor producers and their respective products, but also the producers of parquet, cork and veneer floors … and their respective products. This means a lot of desk research (internet, magazines …) but also visiting fairs and doing trips within US & Canada.']

Amazon Web Services (RedShift, S3, EC2, EMR, etc.) and Apache Spark preferred Professional-level expertise in developing, validating, and executing algorithms and models on large scale systems Familiarity with data visualization applications, like Tableau or RShiny Self-starter with strong analytical, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills Excellent communication skills -- ability to present complex information in a concise and compelling manner Must have the legal right to work in the United StatesDiscovery Communications, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. job_text: ['', '2. Ability to think critically and to formulate solutions to problems in a clear and concise way.', '2. ['', 'Experience with ETL and data integration tool : Airflow, Informatica PowerCenter', '3+ years of day-to-day working experience as data engineer', 'We feel team members are most effective in working on what they are passionate about. We are all capable of working on any given project, and often shift tasks based on preference.', 'NCSOFT is a premiere digital entertainment company and global publisher with worldwide locations and more than 4,000 employees focused on bringing extraordinary games to life for millions of fans around the world. Established in 1997 and headquartered in Seoul, South Korea, we quickly became a key leader in online games. Best known for critically acclaimed franchises including Lineage, Aion, Guild Wars, and Blade & Soul, NCSOFT is also one of the world’s top mobile developers with Lineage 2M occupying the #1 grossing revenue slot on Google Play. Our core goal is making people in this world happier by delivering games that entertain a globally connected audience has remained the same. Our culture is innovative, creative, collaborative and impactful, and we are passionate about creating the best gaming experiences for our players.', 'Experience with object-oriented and functional programming languages: Python, Scala etc.', 'Create large data warehouses by running some ETL (Extract, Transform and Load) that is used for analysis by the analyst/scientists (30%)', 'We collaborate with Analytics, Game Development, Platform and Publishing teams. Our data platform supports all kinds of data in an efficient environment that helps with analysis, customer care and company wide data-driven decisions.', 'Develop, construct, test and maintain architectures such as databases and large-scale data processing systems (10%)', 'We are a passionate and positive team that is always working on new data engineering technology and exciting projects including new game launches.We feel team members are most effective in working on what they are passionate about. We are all capable of working on any given project, and often shift tasks based on preference.We own the data platform, contributing to the design, implementation, and maintenance of these data services so we aren’t shy about experimenting with new tech. However, we take a measured approach in order to minimize introducing unnecessary technical debt.We collaborate with Analytics, Game Development, Platform and Publishing teams. Our data platform supports all kinds of data in an efficient environment that helps with analysis, customer care and company wide data-driven decisions.', 'Experience with RDBMS (MS-SQL, MYSQL etc.) and NoSQL (MongoDB, DynamoDB etc.)', 'Proficiency in general database administration concepts and efficient query writing', 'Experience with AWS cloud services: EC2, S3, EMR, Glue, RedShift, Athena etc.', 'An eagerness to continually improve your skills, learn new technologies a willingness to take initiative beyond basic responsibilities', 'This is a full time, on-site position at our office in Aliso Viejo, CA. job_title: Principal Machine Learning Engineer - Activision Blizzard Media
job_text: ['', '2+ years of experience in NoSQL databases like Bigtable, Cassandra, HBase etc.', 'BA/BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience.', '2+ years of experience in working with relational databases such as MySQL, Postgres etc.', 'Experience with distributed messaging systems like Kafka and RabbitMQ', 'Responsibilities', 'Advance level expertise in Java Development.', 'Mine and analyze data to improve product capabilities and help the team to come up with the new products.', " Experience working with AWS or Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Understanding of machine learning concepts and some experience in working with machine Learning libraries. Experience in building data warehouse and data lake. Knowledge of advertising platform.About Activision And Our Family Of BrandsActivision Blizzard, Inc. (NASDAQ: ATVI), is one of the world's largest and most successful interactive entertainment companies and is at the intersection of media, technology and entertainment. Our combined entertainment network delights hundreds of millions of monthly active users in 196 countries, making us the largest gaming network on the planet!Activision develops, distributes, and publishes deeply immersive interactive entertainment for gaming consoles, mobile and tablet platforms, and PCs, including blockbuster franchises like Call of Duty® and Skylanders®.Blizzard Entertainment develops, distributes and publishes some of the most iconic entertainment experiences in gaming, such as World of Warcraft®, StarCraft®, Diablo®, Hearthstone®, and Heroes of the Storm™, for PCs, mobile and tablet platforms, and consoles.King Digital Entertainment creates leading interactive entertainment for the mobile world. With more than 200 fun titles, King's franchises include Candy Crush ®, Farm Heroes®, Pet Rescue®, and Bubble Witch®.Ready to Play? Apply now!Come join our world and work alongside some of the best and brightest minds in the business.All applications should be made in English.", 'Ready to Play? Apply now!', '7+ years of hands- on experience in software design and development.', 'Knowledge of advertising platform.', 'Work as the lead data strategist to identify compelling patterns and come up with the solutions.', 'Game Changer - What You Bring To The Role', 'Job Description', 'Aggregate huge amounts of data and information from large numbers of sources to discover patterns and features necessary to build machine learning models for prediction and forecasting.', 'Experience with developing extract- transform- load (ETL).', 'Experience working with AWS or Google Cloud Platform (GCP)', 'Experience with distributed computing framework like Apache Spark and Flink.', 'Experience with schema design and data modeling.', 'About Activision And Our Family Of Brands', 'Develop and maintain the necessary infrastructure to run and maintain the algorithms.', 'Level Up - Your Role With Activision Blizzard Media', ' BA/BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience. 7+ years of hands- on experience in software design and development. Advance level expertise in Java Development. 2+ years of experience in working with relational databases such as MySQL, Postgres etc. 2+ years of experience in NoSQL databases like Bigtable, Cassandra, HBase etc. Experience with schema design and data modeling. Strong understanding of large- scale distributed data processing. Experience with developing extract- transform- load (ETL). Experience with distributed messaging systems like Kafka and RabbitMQ Experience with distributed computing framework like Apache Spark and Flink. ', 'Design and implement end- to- end solutions using Machine Learning, Optimization, and other advanced computer science technologies, and own live deployments to drive advertising conversion.', 'Develop a feedback system to improve the selection of features for the algorithms.', 'Identify new data sources and features and collects large data sets to build new models.', ' Work as the lead data strategist to identify compelling patterns and come up with the solutions. Mine and analyze data to improve product capabilities and help the team to come up with the new products. Identify new data sources and features and collects large data sets to build new models. Aggregate huge amounts of data and information from large numbers of sources to discover patterns and features necessary to build machine learning models for prediction and forecasting. Design and implement end- to- end solutions using Machine Learning, Optimization, and other advanced computer science technologies, and own live deployments to drive advertising conversion. Improve the run- time of existing algorithms. Develop and maintain the necessary infrastructure to run and maintain the algorithms. Develop a feedback system to improve the selection of features for the algorithms. ', 'Strong understanding of large- scale distributed data processing.', 'Understanding of machine learning concepts and some experience in working with machine Learning libraries.', 'Improve the run- time of existing algorithms.', 'Experience in building data warehouse and data lake.']

job_title: PhD Data Scientist- Recommender System (Streaming Service)
job_text: ['', 'Lead Data Scientist', 'Role: Lead Data Scientist', 'Role:', 'Location:', 'Qualifications/Requirements', 'Lead development of recommendation system using advanced machine learning techniques such as deep learning, graph modeling, collaborative filter, and reinforcement learningLead research initiatives into state-of-the-art methodologies that will enhance current models and power future personalization featuresWork with business stakeholders to define business requirementsBuild real-time and automated batch machine learning pipelines that include data preprocessing, validation, model training, serving, testing, and measurement.', '3+ years of experience in advanced analytics in industry or in post-doc research', 'Experience implementing systems using Google Cloud or AWS.', '1-2 using Tensorflow or Pytorch', 'Proficient in at least one statistical (R, Python) and one general programming (Julia, Java, Scala or similar) languages.', 'Lead research initiatives into state-of-the-art methodologies that will enhance current models and power future personalization features', 'Experience with commercial recommender systems or an advanced research project on recommender systems.Experience with reinforcement learning-based systems.Experience with deep learning', 'Desired Characteristics', 'Experience with deep learning', 'Experience with reinforcement learning-based systems.', 'Work with business stakeholders to define business requirements', 'Experience with commercial recommender systems or an advanced research project on recommender systems.', 'They are looking for a Lead Data Scientist to support the advanced analytics practices within the streaming service. They are looking for someone who is looking to go beyond classic predictive analytics and into new areas like deep learning and reinforcement learning. This person will be a part of the team that is ultimately working towards building a world-class advanced recommender engine. Additionally, they are looking for someone with recent research experience.', "I'm working with one of the world's leading entertainment/media companies worldwide across production, news, development, and marketing. They own a plethora of TV networks and digital platforms, motion picture companies, and theme parks. They have recently entered the streaming service industry and launched an exciting new product that combines timeless shows and movies\xa0with timely news, sports, and pop-culture!", 'Master or PhD with specialization in Statistics, Computer Science, Data Science, Economics, Mathematics, Operations Research, or another quantitative field or equivalent.', 'Lead development of recommendation system using advanced machine learning techniques such as deep learning, graph modeling, collaborative filter, and reinforcement learning', 'Deep knowledge of statistical methods and machine learning with special emphasis on algorithms like deep learning, reinforcement learning, Bayesian inference, causal modeling, graph modeling, and self-supervised learning.', 'They are looking for a Lead Data Scientist to support the advanced analytics practices within the streaming service. ', 'Responsibilities include, but are not limited to:', 'Master or PhD with specialization in Statistics, Computer Science, Data Science, Economics, Mathematics, Operations Research, or another quantitative field or equivalent.3+ years of experience in advanced analytics in industry or in post-doc research1-2 using Tensorflow or PytorchDeep knowledge of statistical methods and machine learning with special emphasis on algorithms like deep learning, reinforcement learning, Bayesian inference, causal modeling, graph modeling, and self-supervised learning.Experience implementing systems using Google Cloud or AWS.Proficient in at least one statistical (R, Python) and one general programming (Julia, Java, Scala or similar) languages.', 'Location: New York, NY (Remote until July 2021)', 'Build real-time and automated batch machine learning pipelines that include data preprocessing, validation, model training, serving, testing, and measurement.']

['', ' Technically interact with in-house scientific experts and internal/external clients as appropriate.', ' Prepare well-written scientific reports, proposals, and internal documents.', ' Expertise in microspectroscopy, microscopy (light, hot-stage, or SEM/EDS)', ' cGMP pharmaceutical laboratory hands on experience.', ' Various analytical instrumentation, especially those used in a solid state chemistry laboratory such as XRPD, TG, DSC, FT-IR, Raman, KF, and DVS.', ' Develop and utilize characterization techniques to support drug substance and drug product development. Provide expertise and timely support for microscopy/microspectroscopy techniques, which will include but is not limited to SEM, EDS, infrared microspectroscopy, Raman microscopy, and micro-XRF. Mentor, train, and supervise junior members of the group. Independently perform hands-on experimental work utilizing the above instruments Comply with all cGMP and safety requirements, laboratory SOPs, and company policies and procedures. Provide project oversight, client interactions, and expert scientific consulting Develop and write analytical methods and operating procedures according to specific sample or testing requirements. Maintain microscopy instrumentation/equipment per written GMP procedures to ensure optimal operations and quality data generation. Technically interact with in-house scientific experts and internal/external clients as appropriate. Prepare well-written scientific reports, proposals, and internal documents. Demonstrate flexibility in organizing work and priorities for delivering on client timelines. Possess excellent decision making skills to identify and solve work-related issues.', 'BUSINESS:', 'Description', ' Mentor, train, and supervise junior members of the group.', ' Possess excellent decision making skills to identify and solve work-related issues.', ' Doctorate or Master’s degree in Analytical Chemistry, Chemistry, or related science field with relevant laboratory experience', 'In This Role, You Will', ' Independently perform hands-on experimental work utilizing the above instruments', ' Minimum of 5-10 years of related laboratory work experience in a pharmaceutical environment; or an equivalent combination of training and experience', ' Ability to lead, and develop a group of scientists', 'Qualifications', 'Job Description', 'START DATE:', ' Demonstrate flexibility in organizing work and priorities for delivering on client timelines.', ' Excellent communication skills are required, as is a high level of independence and the ability to handle multiple projects', 'Preferred Familiarity With', 'POSTED:', ' Maintain microscopy instrumentation/equipment per written GMP procedures to ensure optimal operations and quality data generation.', ' Critical thinking and problem solving abilities', ' Develop and utilize characterization techniques to support drug substance and drug product development.', ' Comply with all cGMP and safety requirements, laboratory SOPs, and company policies and procedures.', 'Required', ' Provide project oversight, client interactions, and expert scientific consulting', ' Provide expertise and timely support for microscopy/microspectroscopy techniques, which will include but is not limited to SEM, EDS, infrared microspectroscopy, Raman microscopy, and micro-XRF.', ' cGMP pharmaceutical laboratory hands on experience. Various analytical instrumentation, especially those used in a solid state chemistry laboratory such as XRPD, TG, DSC, FT-IR, Raman, KF, and DVS.', 'POSITION TYPE:', ' Develop and write analytical methods and operating procedures according to specific sample or testing requirements.', ' Doctorate or Master’s degree in Analytical Chemistry, Chemistry, or related science field with relevant laboratory experience Minimum of 5-10 years of related laboratory work experience in a pharmaceutical environment; or an equivalent combination of training and experience Expertise in microspectroscopy, microscopy (light, hot-stage, or SEM/EDS) Critical thinking and problem solving abilities Experience with current analytical techniques, design and troubleshooting of experiments, and interpretation of data Excellent communication skills are required, as is a high level of independence and the ability to handle multiple projects Ability to lead, and develop a group of scientists', ' Experience with current analytical techniques, design and troubleshooting of experiments, and interpretation of data']

job_title: Social Media and Data Analyst - Senior Consultant
job_text: ['', 'Disclaimer', 'Business Development', ' Data visualization (e.g., Tableau, PowerBI, DASH, Gephi, i2 ANB, etc.) ', ' Personal and Family Sick Time & Company Paid Holidays ', ' Manage project streams and outputs to deliver open source research, analysis, intelligence, and solutions to our clients  Use established data science and analysis processes to rapidly parse through big data and identify relevant insights  Innovation & Creative Problem Solving: Have a significant technology-first problem solving mindset. Actively participate in designing and building new methodologies, tools, technologies, and solutions for ambiguous and hard-to-define problem sets that require multidisciplinary thinking, technical development, and creative solutioning.  Data Collection: Identify and leverage open source and commercial data sources. Lead the development of data collection strategies; help identify relevant data sets and design consolidation pipelines.  Data Analysis: Apply a methodical and logical approach to analyze diverse data using a variety of tools and technologies, including NLP and machine learning tools. Be comfortable (and excited by) experimenting with new technologies and technical approaches. Use programming languages to perform sophisticated quantitative and qualitative analysis and visualization.  Data Interpretation: Translate analytic findings into actionable outcomes for our clients. Communicate complex concepts with clarity for a wide range of clients. Lead the shaping and development of reports and other deliverables that place quantitative and qualitative findings in strategic context and provide recommendations based on insight, direction and guidance identified in the research completed.  Project Management: Develop project work streams and effectively manage project delivery on time and within budget. Contribute to multiple projects simultaneously, with the ability to deliver high quality work under tight deadlines.  Communication: Communicate well in-person and in writing. Craft compelling communications for our clients, future business prospects, and internally.  Collaboration: Drive collaboration internally to develop new technical approaches, methodologies, and tools to tackle common open source data issues. Work as part of a cross-functional team.  Business Development: Lead and develop business opportunities and develop client relationships. Participate in the coordination and composition of business development requirements, including crafting responses to requests for information and proposals, identifying and organizing past performance qualifications, and participating in general BD opportunity shaping activities. ', 'Responsibilities', ' Foreign language fluency (Arabic, Chinese, Farsi/Persian, Russian, Spanish preferred) ', ' Experience using technologies/tools such as: Traditional media and social media monitoring tools – Meltwater, BrandWatch, BuzzSumo, Crimson Hexagon, Factiva, Sysomos, NetBase, NUVI, Lexis Nexis, Cision, Critical Mention, Storyful, etc.  Open source intelligence (OSINT) tools – Maltego, Babel Street, Geospark, Dataminr, Sayari, etc.  Business intelligence tools – Lexis Nexis, Dun & Bradstreet, Dow Jones, Bloomberg, Credit Risk Monitor, etc. ', " Bachelor's Degree in a related field  At least three years of relevant experience conducting open sources analysis, intelligence gathering, traditional/social media monitoring, or investigations  Previous experience working as a data scientist/analyst (i.e., not just a user of commercial tools, but experience in also building news tools/technical capabilities).
